196b6(khri brgyad): ni nga zhig gus byas 'dzin dang chub byed pa// de la dug dang mtshon dang me bcus mi tshugs/ bad dang bdud kyi phyogs kyis glags kyang rnyed mi 'gyur// la las bde gshegs yongs su mya ngan 'a
196b7(khri brgyad): ba yi// mchod rten rin chen bdun las byas shing mchod byed la// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag gang gA yi// bye ma snyed kyis bye ba phrag song 'di bkang ste// yongs su brtag bzung zhing rnams
196b8(khri brgyad): bye ba mthara' yas na// sems can ji snyed lakhor ba de dag thams cad kyis// las gzhan mi byed b+ha yi me tog sras rabang // byug pas dus gsum bskal pa 'am re bam lag mchod pa// ka
197a1(khri brgyad): zhig gang las rnam 'dren slob sa bcu 'byung 'gyur ga / 'de bar gshegs kyi yuma'i bgrems bam la bris te// 'chang zhing matog drug pas sri spang byed gyur na// mchod rten
197a2(khri brgyad): mchod pa sodon mas deni char mi yo// rgyal ba gas rab chos byin 'di ni gasngags ma/ sems can khams med kyang du sdug bsngal chosa'i byeng// gang dag 'a sa ga dag phyog pa bgyi
197a3(khri brgyad): rten mgon// rig sngags 'di bslabs sman pa'i rgyal po bla med 'gyur// gang dag pha na dang snying rjer bcas pa spyad spyod pa// rig sngags 'di la bslabs nas mkhas pa byang chub reg/ 'du byas pa de dang
197a4(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas pa de gang yin pa/ bde ba de kun 'di las 'byung bar rig par bya// ma ngon btab nas sa la gnas te 'byung 'byung ba/ tshogs bskyed nas nam mang gzugs dgra rnam par ste/ rol phyin
197a5(khri brgyad): chub yon tan ji snyed pa// de dag kun kyang shes rab pha rol phyin las skye// 'khor los sbyar rgyal yam gang nas ni rtag la khrob// lam de nyid nas rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kun// gang nas rgyal
197a6(khri brgyad): gapa mi byin me lo// dekyid napa 'i yo ta chom can 'thob sagyu/ rgyam che la // gas ga gyi sangs sa rgyas 'di 'al/ 
197a7(khri brgyad): dkun tshul ba'i ring ba srel byang bur ba lam ltar k+Sha // bdag ni shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'di nyid len// ci slad cen sdug du mi gus bdag ma ljags// 'o kyang shes rab yongs su bskos
197a8(khri brgyad): pas mchod par bgyid// dper ma rgyal po rten mi rim gro thob par lhung// sangs rgyas ring bsrel shes rab pha rol phyin la brten// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan rin thang med// ga
197b1(khri brgyad): kang du stsal ba de ni phyag ba'i 'os// de byung lhur kyang ga tsho la ni dga' brjid de// yon tan de dag no bu'i la phras [рд╜]na mnan rgyas// rgyas
197b2(khri brgyad): ngan 'das kyang ring bsrel mchod pa brnyem// de ltas gang zhig rgyal ba'i yon tan mas rnags ba par phyim thung 'dzi ni par pa lagasas/ smin pa sbyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba them cha ste/ 
197b3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus pasam gtan de bzhin no// dge chos chung mi gzan phyir yongs su 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni chos rnams thams cad chub gcig ston par byed// daster na 'dzam du'i
197b4(khri brgyad): na shing rnams bye ba song // rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa dum gzugs mang ba// grib mar gyur pa'i grangs su brjod pa ma gtogs par// grib ma sna tshogs med cing bye brag yod ma yin// de bzhin rgya
197b5(khri brgyad): pa'i pha rol kyi lnga 'di dag kyang // shes rab ma phyin pa'i mong nyid thob par 'gyur/ rnams 'ang mkhyen pa nyid khyer yongs su bsngos byas ma/ byi chub ces byar blug po 'di kun rog/ cig 'gyu/ 
197b6(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' gal te rab tu ni shes pazhin// gzugs dang na dang sems pajam par shel// mi rtag yongs su ston pa bcos la myong ba ste// mekhas pa nam yang chos rnam
197b7(khri brgyad): dadage par mi byed do// gang lag zugs kyi tsho min na migs nanam par shes pa ma yin sems pa me mi byas la// chos kun skye me skyong ba'i tshul ngu bshes pa//  shA
197b8(khri brgyad): pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// pha las gang gA'i klung gi bye med zhing rnams na// sems can ji snyed la yong kun dgra bcom nyid btul ba saH/ gang gis shes rab
198a1(khri brgyad): ca mchogs grog ma byin pasod nams kyad par 'phags/ kyang rten sum tsham dag 'ad bslams nas//  rnams mtha 'dun zung ba nyid du zhing ny-in
198a2(khri brgyad): de'os nyan thos myur du rnam par grol la reg/ rang rgyal byang chub dang ni sangs rgyas byang chub reg/ mu gu med par 'jig rten srong 'byung yod med na// de la yal 'dab me tog 'bras brug la 'byung / 
198a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems med rgyal 'byung 'jig rten yod med// 'bras bu brgya byin tshangs pa nyan thos gal 'byung // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang tshe 'od kyi dab 'byed// de tshe sems can las byed brtson pa
198a4(khri brgyad): du// mkhas pa shes phyir 'jig rten byang chub sems byung na// ye shes kyis ni sems can yon tan chos dang ldan// dper na ma dros mtsho la klu bdag med gyur na// 'dzam bur gling 'dir chub
198a5(khri brgyad): 'bab par gal 'gyur// chu klung med na me tog 'bras bu 'byu mi 'gyur// rgya mtshol yang rin chen gzus la mang med par 'gyur// de bzhin 'dir yang byang chub sems med pade gshegs kyi/ 
198a6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten 'di dag kun dug la 'byung // ye shes med na yon tan 'phel med byang chub med// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas chos kyang med par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'diran snang byed srog chags kyi
198a7(khri brgyad): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lod zer gcig phyung ches mchog ste// 
198a8(khri brgyad): tshogs rnam mji snyed sbyin dang tshul khrims dang // bsgom dmas tu ldan pa'ib mdon ma mchog mi sbed pa // byang chub sems dpa sa yi rang sems gci sa/ 
198b1(khri brgyad): mgon po rnams// sdug bsngal zad par bya phyir rin chen chos ston pa/ dang po byang chub mchog tu thugs bskyed bskyed pa nas/ 
198b2(khri brgyad): dag bsod nams gang yin pa// pha rol phyin dang ldan dang sangs rgyas chos gang dang // gang yang sangs rgyas sras rnams dang ni nyan thos dang // slob dang mi slob dge ba zag cem zag med pa// bsdus nas
198b3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang zhing // 'gro ba'i don tu byang chub phyir ni thams cad bsngo// yongs pa sdog la te sems su 'du shes 'byung 'grang zhing // byang chub 'du shes yongs pasngo sems can
198b4(khri brgyad): 'du shes na// 'du shes byir na lha gnas sems ni gsum la chags// dmigs la lo pas yongs su bsngo bar chung ma yin// gal te 'di lta chos 'di 'gags shing zad pa dang // gang du yongs su ba sngo
198b5(khri brgyad): yang zad pa dang / chos kyi chos la nam yang mi bcwo shes gyur na// de ltar mang tu shes pas yongs su rtsesrom pa yin// gal te mtshan mar byed na de ni 'grom yin// ji ste mtshan ma mengon byang rgya
198b6(khri brgyad): bsngog yin// ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang 'ab// dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs// de ltas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba bslab pra ste// ji ltar rgyal ba
198b7(khri brgyad): ga sa sayin //  ga mer gyu da gi na// rjes su sa pa'o// dkyi ma nasapa kya chub byed // 
199a1(khri brgyad): / rgyas me spong rgyal bas gsangs pasdu// de ltar tshangs ba rjod pa chos 'jig rten dmags can gyi/ byang chub sa sus nga chu rnam pa da rnam na/ 
199a2(khri brgyad): dmig pa med pa bye ga khrag khri ka rnams// lam yang mi shes grong khyer 'jug par ga la 'gyur// shes rab med na mig med pa rol byin lnga 'di// dmig zla med pas byang chub reg par nus ma yin/ 
199a3(khri brgyad): gang tshe shes rab kyis ni rab tu zin gla na// de tshe mig rnyed gyur cing 'di yi ming thob bo// dper na ri ma'i las ni yongs zin mig med pa// ji srid mig ma brim pas rngan pa mi thob bzhin// ga
199a4(khri brgyad): sa cag ga nan chos// shes pa rnam par bgaganas rdul tsam mi dmigs // 'jig rten gan shes rab rol byin grangal 'azo// nam mkha' gang la'ang rung bad mi gnas de bang / 
199a5(khri brgyad): gral te bdag ni rgyal po shes rab spyang ba zhing // sems can sdug bsngal rig pazu khrig mang dgrol sems// sems can 'du shes yongs rtogs byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 
199a6(khri brgyad): 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig sngon chad spyod pa'i tshe// pha rol phyin 'dir sprod pa mkhas pa som nyi med// thos ma thag tu nges ni ston pa'i
199a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes bskyed// des ni byang chub nab myung du rtogs par 'gyur// sngon spyong chen sa ma rgyas khrag khrig pasang byas kyang /  shes byin pa ma dngas// thos nas
199a8(khri brgyad): de ri phreng byedade// spangs nas skya ma med mung pa de ni mnar ming lo// de lta bas na gal te yangs rgyas ye shes mchog/ reg par 'do na rgyal ba le lum di nga dad par gyis// dpa na tshong
199b1(khri brgyad): pa rin chen gling du song nas ni// bong zad slar log lta bar gyur na mi rungango // gzums kyi dag pa la bras bu dgapa rangs par bya// 'bras bug chag sa dag thams cad ma khyen nyed dag par 'gyur// dam pa cang
199b2(khri brgyad): mkhyen nyid 'bras bu dag dang gzugs dag pa// nam mkha'i kham pa dang mtshungs te dbyer med la cad du med// dpa' phog pa spyod shes rab pha rol phyin pa lis// khams gsum yang dag 'das la rnam par rdzo
199b3(khri brgyad): rga dang na dang 'chi ba med kyang 'ching pho ston// 'gro ba 'di dag ming dang gzugs kyi padam la chags// rlung gi 'khor po lta bu'i 'khor ba
199b4(khri brgyad): 'khor sor la ldam// 'gro ba laphrul gyi dgas rgyar chung badrar shes nas// bres mas ldan pa mkha' la phra bzhin rnam par chu// spyod pa yongs dgag pashig gzugs la mi spyod cing // rnam shes 'du shes cho
199b5(khri brgyad): ba sems par mi spyod na// de ltar spyod pa chags pa thams cad yongs spong zhing // chags yas rnam grol bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rab spyod// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas gsal
199b6(khri brgyad): / chags bla sa rjid nam krol tshogs pa med par lo// tem skragatan na 'bral lha 'dug pa dang // me btang rtswa nga shing d+hags ma ga grog pa mas// chos rnams thams cad
199b7(khri brgyad): rang bzhin drag cing yongs dag par// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin g+ha na// byed la po yang mi dmigs chos kun mi dmigs te// 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin// 
199b8(khri brgyad): 'phrul pa// byang chub sems dpa' shes ra spyod paji ltar 'tsham// phung po bams la rdul tsam brtson par mi byed cing/ 
200a1(khri brgyad): brjod// ganganas rgyas 'di sul dang snyam 'dra yos sa/ sos te med ci zlalam bya ni spyod kyangs// sems can ni ring nam me chen zhugs mig bya// sangs rgya
200a2(khri brgyad): khrag khrig mngal lhag byam yin// dgon pa'i lam ning pag tshad ming por zhugs pa'i mim// gnag rje mtshams kyi nags tshal phun phum tshogs mthong nas// 'di dag grong dang grob byer nye bar brtanas
200a3(khri brgyad): sa ste// dbugs kyin rnyed par 'gyur zhing chom kun 'jigs pa med// de bzhin bya chub yongs pa chol me rgyal rnams kyi// shel rab ros kyi mnyan pa gang yog/ 
200a4(khri brgyad): 'jigs med de/ dgra bcom sa la ma yin rkyen rtogs sa la min// mi zhig rgya mtsho'i chu ni blta phyir 'gro ba yis// gal te shing dang dgas tsha la'i mthong dadung ring // ci ste rtags ma mdo na rgya mtsha
200a5(khri brgyad): yon// nye bar gyur to snyam ste de la som nyi med// de ltar byang chub dam par rabazhugs rgyal ba yis// shes rab 'om phyin mnyan par rig par bya// rnam par 'dren pa sa mngon sum lung ba sa
200a6(khri brgyad): bgyur kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub ring por mi thogs bdag reg 'gyur/ dpyid dus pa bang la sdong po lo ma lpags gyur na// lal gal ring por mi ma/ ma lo 'bram me tog bskrun// shes rab kyi
200a7(khri brgyad): na 'di su yi lag thob pa// ring por mi thogs 'dren pa rnams kyi byang chub tho'o// dper na bud med sbrum gangs bya ba snga mnyen gyur na// de ni de 'i btsal ba'i rdul la bab ces bya// de bzhin byang cha
200a8(khri brgyad): yis dpa rgyal ba'i shes pa shan// dag nga 'dun pa skyed pa yung duH
200b1(khri brgyad): gang ni gachos dang chom min chos dbyings mi man ri// myang ngan 'dam pa me ga de ni shes pa gnas// gang shig 'ding spyod sangs rgyas ches rnams mi rtog ste/ snyongs dang / khru phul na pa nga
200b2(khri brgyad): cod gang lags/ ston pas bka ma par du gsong ba myu mang ste// de las zhig dag yang nga// rgyal ba'i thal pa co byin di mis yang du rnam pa ma
200b3(khri brgyad): kyang ring / 'gro 'i ngos byas par grog pazhin byang bang // ma babyams pa gatha din bdu rtsims// 'di na cig so nyi thu he/ ldanapa pa ni bdag gi ming yang 'ongs ma brjod/ 
200b4(khri brgyad): sa sgru yos su 'dod ce/  ts+tshin zung klog rgyas /  sa la ni/ tsha gas su la sa chos bas khyab/ 
200b5(khri brgyad): nas grang 'i rjes ni tshul bltar// shes ba pa rdo byin chos mngachil de na mo/ dper na lal sa rob rgya ldan pa'i bas rnyed pa// thal mchog rnyeng nam las ngan tshol bar byed pa lta
200b6(khri brgyad): dpa' ba dol byin pa'i rnyed dus// dgra bcom sa ses kyang chu tshul byed de bzhin no// dri sang 'do par gyu ba 'ing rnyed pa 'dod 'asrur dang // lha dang bca' ba'i sems kyis khyim dris byang gyur cing/ 
200b7(khri brgyad): btang nas ni chos min bya ba spyod 'gyur ba// lam por lam gol 'gro ba 'di bdud kyi las// gang de de'i che na 'dun cing dang myang nas// chos kyi dam pa 'di ni nyan du song ba las// de dag gis ni cho
201a1(khri brgyad): bya ba ldan ciganas// dga' ma cing med me 'de bar byung nas 'gro// de'i can du kyalas nga byung bar 'gyur//  tshag dag gis ni dge slong ma thugs nas// shes bal
201a2(khri brgyad): 'di 'don par mi 'gyur ba'i// ba pa rnamamang gzhan yang byung gyu// ri na da rkyed 'gyugs ma// de dag don mas rgyag tu chub sa sa// de zhin
201a3(khri brgyad): rgyal ba'i shes rab pha rob phyin pa mchog/ rin chen chos kyang dazhon la rtag tu 'tshe ba'ang mang // me ga pa gsar du zhugs pa'i sems can blo chung ba// gang zhig dkon pa'i rin chen 'di ni ma rnyed pa// de
201a4(khri brgyad): bar chad bya phyir bdud ni spo bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag yongs su 'dzin la spyod// ma nig na bar gyur la bu ni mang yod pa// de gun yid mi bes ning de la rim gro byed// de bzhin phyogs ba
201a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten khams kyi sangs rgyas kyang // lum gyur shes bud dam pa'is pa dgongs pa mang // gang dag 'das dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon gang da / ma 'ongs dus na byung 'khrur de dag di la ca
201a6(khri brgyad): 'jig rten ston pa rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yum// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod pa ston par byed// 'jig rten de bzhin nyid dang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// rang rgyal de bzhin nyid dang
201a7(khri brgyad): rgyal sras de bzhin nyid// gcig pa nyid de dngas bral gzhan min de bzhin nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen// mkhas pa 'jig rten gnas sam mya ngan 'das kyang
201a8(khri brgyad): chos nyid skyon med chos rnams spong ba 'di gnas te// byang chub sems dpas de bzhi na nya 'di rjes su rtogs// de phyir de bzhin gshegs zhes sangs rgyas mtshan ga sol
201b1(khri brgyad): / shes rab pa rol phyin pa dga' tshal ladzin pa// stobs bcu rnam 'dren rnams kyi spyod yul 'di yin te// sems can sdug bsngal ngan song gsum las longs 'don kyang // de dag nam yang sems
201b2(khri brgyad): can 'du shes 'gyur ba med// dper na seng ge ri sul brten nas 'jigs med par// ri dag phra mo mang stsag byed cing sgra sgrogs ltar// mi yi seng ge shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas// mu stegs can mang skrag
201b3(khri brgyad): 'jig rten skya yang sgrogs// dper na nam mkhar gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ni// sa 'di sems par byed cing gzugs kyang rab du ston// de bzhin chos rgyal shes rab pha rog phyin rtun pa// sred pa'i chu
201b4(khri brgyad): sgoms shing chos kyang rab tu ston// gzugs rnams mi mthong tsho bdag kyang mi mthong ning // 'du shes mthong ba med la sems par mi mtho ba ning // gang la rnam par shes dang sems yid mthong med pa/ 
201b5(khri brgyad): de ni chos mthong yin zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bstan// nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tur marjod la// nam mkha' ji ltar mthong su don 'ang brtag par gyis// de ltar chos mthong ba yang de
201b6(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pas bstan// mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par rus ma yin// gang gis de ltar mthong ba de yis chos kun mthong // rgyal po btang snyoms 'jug cing blon po kun byed ltar// sangs
201b7(khri brgyad): dzad dang nyan thos chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad shes rab pha rol phyin pa byed// rgyal po grong du mi 'gro yul 'khor mi 'gro la// rang gi yul nas 'du ba thams cad srud pa ltar// byang chub
201b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chom nyid gang dung mi 'grol// sangs rgyas sa mi yon tan gang yin thams cad 'asdud/ gang la bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang matan yod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog
202a1(khri brgyad): la bsam sbyong ba// nyan thos dang rgyalas gnyis shin 'anas byas nas// zil gyis minon rgyal ba'i byang chub myur du'o// de dzin rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i srini chag gyur ba// mi ga / 
202a2(khri brgyad): bam rtsa'am shing ni mi 'dzin pa// chu dbus 'jig par 'gyur te ngogs su phyin mi 'gyur// gang zhig 'dzin pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// de ltar dang ldan dad pa thob pa gang zhig ni// shes rab
202a3(khri brgyad): pa ro/ phyin yum rjes su mi 'jug/ min// de dag thabs kyi yon tan shes rab yongs pa na// mchod du rmad byung ba de ga shegs byang chub myur du ga/ dper na la las rdza sa ma btang chu srud na// tsam
202a4(khri brgyad): dru phyir ni myur du 'jig par rig par bya// so btang bum par chu skyed lam du 'jig pa yi// 'jigs pa med cing bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur// de'i na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa mang gyur kyang // shes rab
202a5(khri brgyad): / rnam par nyams na mur du myu 'du 'gyur// dad pas shes rab kyis ni yongs su zin gyur na// sa gnyis shin du 'das te byang chub mtsho zong 'gyur// dper na bac+doMs legs ma byas kyi rgya mtsho'i
202a6(khri brgyad): nad// nor dang bcas shing tshod par bcas te 'jigs par 'gyur// gru de legs par bcos legs byas dang ldan gyur na// ni 'jig nor dang bcas par dogs su phyin par gyur// de lur byang chub
202a7(khri brgyad): sems dpa' dad pas yongs bsgos kyang // shes rab med na byang chub las ni myur nyams 'gyur// de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog ldan na// 
202a8(khri brgyad): 'gyur// mo gyi te bu yon tenas shing sdug bsngal mi// langs kyi dag nyid gro ba bdus pa ma yin te// de ni gsas de yon gnyis nam kyi mi la sbyin phya ra// 'gyes pa'i 'ang shes
202b1(khri brgyad): pa med cing ba de brag 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' shes rab stobs chung ba// rab tu zhugs par gyur kyang ra tu nyams par 'gyur// de nyid pam mkhas shes mchog gas
202b2(khri brgyad): yongs zin na// mi nyams de pa'in gshegs kyi byang chub reg par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i lapa kyi sar gnas gang // lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ 
202b3(khri brgyad): slob ma bzang po blam gus ldan de dag gis// bla ma ma khas pa rnams la rtag tu bsten par bya// tsi myir zhen mkhas 'i yon tan da las 'byung// de dag shes rab pha rol phyin pa rjes su s+ho// sangs rgyas
202b4(khri brgyad): chos rnams dge ba'i bzhis la rten to nas/ yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' rgyal ba des dgasung // sbyin dang tshu ba khrims bzod dade de bzhin brtsoni 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab byang chub yongs su
202b5(khri brgyad): bAr gyis// byang chub phung por nen nas mchog 'i nam byed ces// dang po'i las can de la de skad bstan par bya// de ltar spyod pa legs 'tsho sa pa'i nub rnams// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang dbang gnyen dang ni gan+da
202b6(khri brgyad): yin te// rten dang srid nga kring dang yongs dren don 'don pa// gsal byed sngon ma chos mchog sma mi 'jigs pan// srang+ge pa cher ldan rnams byedag/ 'bo tsho myon byadang // phung mo sems dang skye mched rnams
202b7(khri brgyad): go cha min// theg gsum 'du shes bra ba ning yongs su b.rung ba med// me ldog g.yo ba med cing mi 'khrugs chos can yin// de dag 'di sring chos dang ldan zhing sres pa med// the tshom so ma nya med gau tA 'bral
202b8(khri brgyad): ning don sa ldan// shes rab pa ros phyin pa thos nas mi rung ba// gzhan gyi dring mi 'jos kyi kyi sngog rim par bya// 'dren pa rnams kyi cho ma 'id pas snye mthong bar kar// sum kyang rtogs pa med cing rtso
203a1(khri brgyad): bar gyung med pa// debyur sanam dad sa rtsa can bya chub brnas na ma/ sems can tshogs sunas skyem thugs khra chung ba yadzad// mams can rnams na gnas ladas 'ad
203a2(khri brgyad): sma rnams 'dod// 'dzin la gnas shing mimakhas blan rmongs mun pa bzhin// thob par bya ba'i chos ni gnas med 'dzin med de// des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung ba yin// nam mkha'i khams ni shar
203a3(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs dang lho phyogs dang // de bzhin nub kyi phyogs dang byang phyogs pa mtha' yas// steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu'i ji snyed rnams na'ang yod// tha dang gyur pa med cing bye brag gyur pa med// 'das pa'i de
203a4(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid gang ma byod de yizhin nyid// da ltar de bzhin nyid gang dgra bcom de bzhin nyid// chos kun de bzhin nyid gang rgyal po'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med// bde gshegs
203a5(khri brgyad): dra chub tha dang chos dang bral gyur ba// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang ni gzob 'dod pa// thabs dang ldan pas shes rab pha rol phyin la sbyor// 'dren pa'i shes rab med na thob par 'gyur ma
203a6(khri brgyad): yin// bya zhig lus che dpag tshad brgya rtsa lnga bcu par// gyur la 'dab gshog ba de nyam rtsal yod min na// de yis sum bcu rtsagasum gnas nas 'jam gling 'dir// bdag nyid mtshangs na dang / 
203a7(khri brgyad): ni nyam nyes gyur pa yin// rgyal ba rnams kyi pha rol phyin pa lnga 'di yang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por bsgrub byas shing // smon lam mtha' yas rgya chen 'jig rten rtag bsten kyang khabs
203a8(khri brgyad): med shes rab bral ba nyan thos nyid du lhung // sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung 'dod gang // 'gro ba kun la sems snyoms pa ma'i 'du shes dang // phan pa'i sems dang byams
203b1(khri brgyad): pa'i yid kyis bcul gyi ning // zlab med cing drang 'a tshig la ma smra bar bya// 'jig rten mgon la gnas brtan rab 'byor yongs nus pa// yon tan rgya margya'i nyon mongs ma mchis rtags bstan gsol
203b2(khri brgyad): mthu che ba dag ji ltar slar ldog mi 'gyur ba// de ltar yon tan phyogs tsam rgyal bas lung bstan gsol// tha dad 'du shes bral zhing rigs pa ldan tshig smra// dge sbyong dag dang bram ze gzhan la rten mi byed// 
203b3(khri brgyad): mkhas pas dus rnams rtag tu ngan song gsum po spangs// de dag dge bcu'i las kyi lam la mngon par brtsod// zang zing med par 'grol chos ni rjes su sbyor// chos la gcig tu dga' ning rtag
203b4(khri brgyad): 'jam ldan// 'gro 'cha gnyal dang 'dug par shes bzhin rab tu ldan// gnya' shing gung tsam pa b+ha 'ing 'grol sems 'khrul med// gced byas gtsang mi ri gas 'chang gsum po dben shing dag/ rnyed 'dod
203b5(khri brgyad): la yin gru mchog rtag tu chos 'dod pa// bdud kyi yul las 'das shing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ bsam gtan bzhi la bsam gtan bsam gtan der mi gnas// grags pa 'dod pa ma yin khro bas
203b6(khri brgyad): sems kyi da// khyim par gyu gyung rtag tu ngos po spyo ma chanas//  byi yangs langs skyed tshul mi byed// ga chum stong sdigs mi byed bud med skyong grags min// du
203b7(khri brgyad): las can po mor 'gyur zhes ston mi byed// rab tu dben pa'i shes rab pha rol phyin mchog brtson// 'thab dong myong
203b8(khri brgyad): rtag tu gnos sems ldan// mam ro 'a bor ma 'i skye ba'i yul mthar rnam par spangs// rang gis la dgos med rtag tu ri ba 'dra// chos phyir srog kyang 'dir zhing rnal 'byor rang tu
204a1(khri brgyad): brtson dmi ldog rtags ni 'di dag yin sngar shes par bya// kha gas pang tshos 'du shes sa blas rnam shes rnams// zab ste rang bzhin mtshan ma med cing ngab zhig/ dper na mdang / 
204a2(khri brgyad): yis rgya mtsho'i gtid thug tshul bltar// bres rab kyis ni brnams na phung pa'i gting mi rnyed// byang chub sems dpa' ga ba zhig de ltar za 'gyur cin// theg pa dod dam chags me gang baphung po nga// 
204a3(khri brgyad): dang skye mched yod men chos 'di rtogs pa de'i// bsod nams yang dag grub pa de las ci zhig yod// dper na 'dod chags chos la spyod pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bud med dus btab de dang ma phrad de yi ni/ 
204a4(khri brgyad): rterten cig sems kyi rnam rtog spyod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed bskal pa'i byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' go zhig bskal mang bye stong du// dgra bcom rang rgyal sbyin byed tshul
204a5(khri brgyad): khrims srung byed kyang // gapa ni go shes rab pha rol phyin mchog ldan pa'i chos// brjod pa'i rigs la sbyin dang tshul khrims char mi phod// byang chub sems dpa' ga nig shes rab mchog po sgoms te/ 
204a6(khri brgyad): de las langs nas gos pa med pa'i chos brjod cing // de yang 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub rgyur bsngon// dge ba de dang mnyam pa 'jig rten gsum na med// bsod nams de yang gsog dang de bzhin
204a7(khri brgyad): spong ba dang // gso ba dang yA ma rA dang snying po med par shes// de ltar bde gshegs rnams kyi shes rang spyad spyod na// spyod tshe bsod nams dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin// sangs rgyas kyis can
204a8(khri brgyad): tshe da thams cad brjod pa tsam du zad shes nas// bskal pa byeg/ 
204b1(khri brgyad): byang chub mchog pa 'gyung // 'brumar snying po bar ba phrad pa dang pa yis// snying batshig min da med par yang de mi tshig/ me lce bra pa thams snying pochog min la// me lceb ma med par mying mchog
204b2(khri brgyad): ltar// dang po'i sems kyis byang chub mchog reg ma yin la/ de med par yang de la reg par nus ma yin//  ma'i sems kyis byang chub pa nos min la// de med par yang de bab nus bla ma yin no// sa bon
204b3(khri brgyad): las ni mA b+h+yo/ 'bras ts+tsha ts+tsha// dem gags pa shi ma med pa de min // de sbyin da pa'i sems ca byang rgyu te/ de 'a ga gas bya chu med pa ma yin// tshum na
204b4(khri brgyad): bum pa dang po po ma'i bar// rim gyis cung ngu dus de yongs 'gengs pa lhur// de bzhin dang po'i sems kyang byang chub mchog rgya ste// rim gyis dkar po'i yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// 
204b5(khri brgyad): stong pa mtshan med smon pa med pa'i chos snyed cing // mya ngan 'das la mi rig mtshan mar mi spyod pa// dper na mnyan pa mdzes pa par 'gro tshul 'gro yang // mAtha gnyis mi gnas rgya mtshor
204b6(khri brgyad): gnas pa med pa bzhin// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam bdag/ stobs bcus lung bstan byang chub reg 'gyur rlob sems med/ 
204b7(khri brgyad): pamed// de ltar spyod pa pa gzhi nas she sa rang skyed pa yin// 'jig rten dkon pa'i lamadang mu de nad bcas par// mthong nas skrag pa med cing de nam go phyin te// phyi ma'i mumamar
205a1(khri brgyad): rtag tu rtson ni rang zhes nas/ sasu skye ba 'i ni dum ma // rgyu \u0f7fsems dpa sa / na cing// phul 'di ga gdod na
205a2(khri brgyad): ning skye me shes// mnyam par ma ban ga sems can byanas mi rnyi la \u0f7f// bar ni ba sto sa sa rgyamatshas las mengs mi nyams// dpedun skyes gu bas payi ni rten na
205a3(khri brgyad): ldan zhing // stobs ldan mi thub brtson byas sgra rtsal cho ga shes// 'phong dang bzlog nas mang po'i pha rol phyin gyur cing // sgyu ma sgrub shes 'grod no rab tu 'dod pa zhog/ pha dang ma dang chung ma
205a4(khri brgyad): par yongs bsdus nas// dag byed mang ba dgon pa'i lam du phyin pa dang // de mis dpa' ning rngub por spyos su mang sprul to// bid bar so zhing pyir yang khyim du 'ong ba ltar// de bzhin de
205a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa yang / sems can jas kun du snying rje cher bskyed cing // bdudu bzhi dag dang ma gnyis las kyang rang 'das nas// ting 'dzin mchog la gnas shing
205a6(khri brgyad): byang chub reg mi byed// mkha' la rlung brten de la chu mi phung po rten// dalas chen ring gyi rten de la 'gro 'di dag pa rten// sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra ste// nam mkha' gang la
205a7(khri brgyad): gnas yini don 'od bsam par gyis// de bzhin byang chub sems dpar stong pa nyid gnas pa// 'gro la sems can shes pa'i smon lamangon n+dan gyis// bya ba rnam par sna tshogs dum
205a8(khri brgyad): spyani byed cing // myangangan 'das la mi rig sung bar gnas pa med// gang gi chen byang chub sems dpa' ma bsags papa// stong yini pa'i ting 'dzin dam pa'i spyod pa/ ba
205b1(khri brgyad): skabs dang nimatshan mar tu rnam byed// mtshan mam pa nam //  ma// dan gan na
205b2(khri brgyad): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar sker spyod bya// mya ngan 'das la mi rig satshan mar spyod / yin// dper na 'phong bslabs skyes bus gnam du ma pa 'phangs te// mang gzhani dag gi
205b3(khri brgyad): bzhin brgyad mar longs btags te// sdo ma'i mdar nges la ltung ba'i skabs mi 'byed// mi de 'dod na mdang des la ltung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog spod pa// shes rab
205b4(khri brgyad): thabs stobs rdzu 'phrul gyis ni rnam spyod pa// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba ji srid ma rdzogs pa// de srid sto nyid dam pa den thob mi byed// dper na dge slong rdzu 'phrul stobs mchog ldan pa zhig/ 
205b5(khri brgyad): nam mkha' gnas te cig char tshe 'phru lo rnam par 'phrul// 'gro dang 'chag pa dang ni nya la dang 'dug pa ston// de ni skyob med cing de la bya pa med// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa stong
205b6(khri brgyad): gnas shing // ye shes rdzu 'phrul pha po son la gnas pa med// 'gro ba dag la bya ba rnam pa mtha' las ston// bskal pa bye bar skyob med cing dub pa med// dper na mo 'ga' g.yangs chen por 'dug byed
205b7(khri brgyad): /  lag pa gnyigs gdu/ sa gnyis 'dzin cing nam mkha' la// 'byod bar byed cing gsangs chen po lus bor nas// lhong bar mi 'gyur ji srid de ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub
205b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rjer gnas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi gdugs ni yongs bzung ste// chos rnams stong po mtshan med smon pa med ton cing // mya ngan 'das la rig pa med la
206a1(khri brgyad): / sems can sdug bsngal yang du 'dzag par 'gyur ma yin// dper na don gnyer tshong ba rgyus shes bya ba'i phyir// bar gyi grong khyer grong brdal grong gang yin par 'gro// de yang mi gnas
206a2(khri brgyad): rin chen gling du'ang mi gan sel// rig pa khyim du mi gnas lam la mkhas par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' gsal te nyan thos dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi shes pa rnam thal
206a3(khri brgyad): kun la mkhas// de la mi gnas sangs rgyas ye shes gnas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas la mi banas lam gyi tshul shes yin// gang chu 'grol byams pas rjes su 'brel byas nas/ 
206a4(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin stong pa mtshan med smon pa med spyod pa// de ni mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur zhe'am// 'dus byas yin par gdags nus de ni gnas med do/ dper na sprul pa'i mi lus me
206a5(khri brgyad): snang ma yin zhing // de ni mang gis kyang ni gdags par nus par ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnamathar sgor spyod pa// de ni ming gis kyang ni gdags par nus pa yin/ 
206a6(khri brgyad): gil te smad pa dang ni dbang po yangs dris la/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i chos// yongs su mo snyan phyir me ldog pas yi chos// mi 'chang de ni lung ma bas
206b1(khri brgyad): par dag par bya// dgra ba tsams dang rkyen gyi sangs rgyas ye shes dang // khams gsum dag la n+de lam na sa mi'ad cing // sangs rgyas rnams mthong bshAl chos kyang sgo dbyung sa/ na mi na
206b2(khri brgyad): lung bstan yin par rig par bya// rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum gnas mthong // skad cig de la ngan song rgan bcad smon lam 'debs// bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis me yi phung po zhe/ 
206b3(khri brgyad): de ni mi ldeg lung bstan yin par rig par bya// mi yi 'jig rten 'byung ba'i gdon dang nang mang ba// phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis ni// 'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa/ 
206b4(khri brgyad): de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya// ci ste de ni bden po'i byin rlabs sna tshogs dag/ 'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems 'byung ba 'am// gal te byang chub sems
206b5(khri brgyad): dpa' gzhan gyis lung bskur rlom// rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung shes par bya// mi dge ba ni las bdadadu ni nye bar 'ongs gyur nas// 'di skad smras te 'di ni khyod dang pha ma dang // khyod kyi bdun mes
206b6(khri brgyad): dbye bar gyi ming yin zhing // gang tshe khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ming 'di yin// sbyangs sngam rnal 'byor ldan pa ci 'dra 'bang 'a gyur la// byad sngon yon tan tshul yang 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod do/ 
206b7(khri brgyad): skad gang thos rlom sems byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang da blo chung rig par bya// rab tu dben pa'i grong dang grong khyer ri sul dang // dgon pa dben pa nags khrod rab tu bsnyen
206b8(khri brgyad): byed cing // bdag pa stong gzhan la smong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni// bdud kyis yongs su bslang ning bro chung rid par bya// rtag tu grong dang yul 'khor grang rdal gnas byed cing // mardzi
207a1(khri brgyad): car smin byang byang chub brtson pa ma gtogs par// de ni dgra bcom dang rgya ba da pa gzhan ma ste// 'don bad par gzugs kyisras kyis dbe na par gsungs// gang na ga ngan
207a2(khri brgyad): lnga brgya yong pa'i rol sul// sbrul gyis gang bar lo ma bye bar gnas byed kyang // dben pa 'di mi shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'ang // lhag pa'ang rgyal rnyed nas 'dre bar gnas pa yin
207a3(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i don brtson bsam gtan dang // stobs dang dbang po rna mthar ting 'dzin thob de la// 'di ni dkon dben spyod pa min snyam brnyas byed pa// de ni bdud kyi spyod yulag
207a4(khri brgyad): shes rgyal bas gsungs// gang zhig grong ngam 'on te dkon par gnas kyang rung // theg pa gnyis kyi sems bral byang chub mchog nges na// 'di ni 'gro don zhugs pa rnams kyi dben pa ste// byang chub
207a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' drod tsa mar ni bdag nyid nyams// de lta bas na byang chub dam pa tshol ba yis// bsam badrag ldan mamos pas rgyal des bcom ste// nad pa'i tshigs kyi gso phyir smad pa 'o sgo
207a6(khri brgyad): ltar/ galal ba med par dge pa'i bzhes gnyen bsnyen par b+ha// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog drugs byang chub sems dpa' ga// pha ma phrin dang bcas te dge ba'i ba'os su bsted
207a7(khri brgyad): dedag rjes su ston byed 'di ni bsgrub pa'i sa// rgyu rnam gnyis kyi sangs rgyas byang chub myur du rtogs// rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa// kun lam pha rol phyin
207a8(khri brgyad): 'as bzhin ma yin// padis bye ra gyi chog la thugs rnams kyi// sas yong dun dang sdel du spyo mchog yin zhes pa da // de rgya gas ra ma bya
207b1(khri brgyad): // chos 'a thams cam mtshan nyid de nga 'drar shes shing // chos rnams stong ning mtshan ma med par ra shes na// de ltar spyod pa bdeg shenas shes rab spyong pa yin// sems can yongs su cho/ 
207b2(khri brgyad): bzas la 'dod byed cing / 'khor bar chags pa'i yid dang ldan rnams rtag tu 'khor// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis yang dag mon spong ste// byis pa bdag nyid kyis ni mkhang pa mdud pa por// dper na
207b3(khri brgyad): dogs pa'i 'du shes kyis ni dug bsrung ba// du gede khong du song ba med kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin byis pa bdag dang bdag gis khas len pa// bdag der 'du shes yang dag mi rtog sde zhing 'chi/ 
207b4(khri brgyad): lter 'dzin pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs bstan// bdag dang bdag gir mi dmigs rnam par byang bar gsusas// 'di la 'ang yang nyon mongs rnam pa' 'gyur med par/ byang chub sems dpas shes
207b5(khri brgyad): pha rol phyin pa rtogs// 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji srid ma lus pa// de dag thams cad byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// ma spyod bye ba mang por smin pa byin byas la// kun 'dra
207b6(khri brgyad): don du byang chub rgyar rab sngo yang // gang nig shes rab pa rol phyin mchog mngon brtson pa// tha na nyi ma gcig cig rjes su 'dron byed ma/ de la sbyin pa'i phung pos bsod nams char mi 'ad//  phyir
207b7(khri brgyad): g.yel med rtag tu shes rab 'jug par bya// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyong ba'i rnal 'byor pa// snying rje chen po bskyed kyang sems na na 'du shes med//  tshe mkhas pa 'gro yun gyi sbyin
207b8(khri brgyad): 'gyur/ ga la khor bas nga snga mas don yang mangs su spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i gang 'di yun rangs 'brel ba mi/ lha med na long gsum mi sems can
208a1(khri brgyad): lam yangs pa po so du can mas la sto dod pas/ na thog pa par la rtso la brtson par bya// mnan ston ma rnyed pa na mchog
208a2(khri brgyad): dus gzhan zhig na rnyed par gyur te dga'ang las// rnyed mthag tu bag med gyur te sbyor na ni// stor bas rin chen mngon 'dod rtag tu sdug bsngal lo// de ltar byang chub mchog zhugs rin chem
208a3(khri brgyad): bu'i// shes rab pha rol phyin la rnal 'byor dong mi bya// rin chen rnyed nas blangs te rab tu brtson dkris nas myur du 'gro bar byed bzhi bar 'gyur pa bzhin// nyi ma sprin dang bral ba'i 'od zer drab
208a4(khri brgyad): mun nag thibs po mun pa thams cad 'joms 'char ba// srin bu ma kher srog chags 'byung po thams cad dang // skar ma'i tshogs dang dra bo'i 'od kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin byang chub sems
208a5(khri brgyad): dpa' shes rab pha rol phyin// mchog spyong stong pa dang ni mtshan ma med spong ba// mkhas pas lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas 'gro kun dang // dgra bcom dang rgyal byang chub sems mang zil gyis
208a6(khri brgyad): gnon// dper na rgyal po'i bu zhig nor gtong don 'dod pa// kun gyi gtso bor gyur te mngon par 'gro bya'os// 'dri ni de lta na yang sems can mang dga' byer// thabs thob gyur te rgyal srid
208a7(khri brgyad): gnas nas spos cing gos// de ltar shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // bdud rtsi sbyin par byed cing lha dang mi rnams dga'// 'di ni daldan yod sems can mang pan brtson/ 
208a8(khri brgyad): chos kyi rgyal por gnas par gyur nas smos ci dgos// de yi chen bdud ni zug rngu ldan par 'akur// mya ngan nyam zag sdug bsngal yid mi bde nyam chung // ji ltar byang chub las
208b1(khri brgyad): da 'dzang yang nur 'gyur zhes// 'jigs pa bstan phyir phyogs rnams sreg cing skar mad ga tod// gang cha mkhas pa de dag par mab drag ldan na// nyon mtshan nas rab pa ros rkyen pa
208b2(khri brgyad): don lnga// de ni lus sems dag ni mkha' 'gro bya ltar rgyu// nag pa'i rtsa lag rnams kyis klags rnyed ga la 'gyur// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'thab dang rtsod gyur rtog/ phan tshun ma
208b3(khri brgyad): mthun khros pa'i sems dang ldan gyur pa// de tshe bdud ni dga' zhing mchog tu nyams bder 'gyur// de gnyis rgyal ba'i ye shes las ni ring 'gyur snyam// de gnyis ring du 'gyur zhing sha za 'dra
208b4(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur// gnyi ga rang gi dam bcas nyams par byed par 'gyur// sdang zhing bzod dang bral la byang chub ga la yod/ de tshe bdud rnams phyogs dang bcas te dga' bar 'gyur// lung bstan ma
208b5(khri brgyad): tho byang chub sems dpa' gang cig gis// lung bsnyen pordzo pa sems thos rjod pa com myed na// bzod da pan sems kyi skad cib snyed pa// de myed bskal par gzha nas ma
208b6(khri brgyad): bgos so// sangs rgyas bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pas byang cha ba reg/ sems 'di bzang ba min snyam dran pa skyed byed cing // so sor 'chags par byed cing phyis kyang sdom byed la// dga' ba
208b7(khri brgyad): mi med de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dir srog/ gang zhig slob che bslab pa gang yab bas ma na// slobab po dang pa sgrub pa'i chos rnams mad mags shing // bsla ba dang bslab pa sa
208b8(khri brgyad): yin 'de gnyis myi dag pa// de gyur yang skyob de ni sangs rgyas chos 'dis slob// byang chub sems dpa' gas no ga lto ba slab 'ad shes// de ni gzhan yang bslebs nyams chu
209a1(khri brgyad): khrims 'tshal ma 'bru dra/ don sangs rgyas chos mnyam kyi phyo nga sreg ldan parlab phrag ba slab la mkhas ta dmigs pa mag// mkhas pa'ang byed rnams kyi shes
209a2(khri brgyad): de ltar slob// dge ba ma yin sems gcig tsam yang bskyed mi byed// nyi ma mkha' la 'gro ba'i zer gyis zil gnon pa'i// mdun gyi bar snang la ni mun pa mi gnas bzhin// shes rab
209a3(khri brgyad): rol phyin la bslab pa byas rnams kyi/ pha rob phyin pa thams cad 'dir ni 'dus par 'gyur// 'jig tshogs lta bar ltang drug cu gnyis 'dus ltar// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa 'di dag 'dus pa
209a4(khri brgyad): gsungs// dper na srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbong po gzhan// gang dag ji snyed yo pa thams cad 'gag par 'gyur// de ltar shes rab spyod pa mkhas pa mchog rnams kyi/ pha rol phyin bajam
209a5(khri brgyad): cad 'dir ni 'dus par gsungs// byang chub sems mkhas nyan thos yon tan gang dag dang // de bzhin rang rgyal yon tan kun la slob byed cing // de dge de la mi gnas 'dod pa mi bskyed de// 'di ni
209a6(khri brgyad): bdag gis bslab bya yin snyam de phyir slob// mi ldog byang chub mchog par btu zhugs pa yi// sems bskyed pa la bsam pa thag pas yi rang ba// stong gsum ri rab srang la gan
209a7(khri brgyad): chad gzung rung // rjes su yi rang dge ba de ni de la min// dge bdon gter bar 'ad sems can ji snyed pa// kun gyi bsod nams phung po la yang yi rang 'gyur// de phyir de dag rgyal ba'i mam
209a8(khri brgyad): 'gyur ras// sdug bcu'o/ zad par bya phyi 'jig rten chos sbyin byed// byang chub sems dpa' ga dag mi rtog chos rnams kun// spong nga mtshan ma med dang spros med yongs
209b1(khri brgyad): shes pa// de ni bris rabu gnyis kyis byang chub tshal ma byed// rnal 'byor bde shes 'bapa sa phyin mchog brjod// nam mkha' khams dadang ni nam thada' der 'gal ba// yangs ma yin gang gis
209b2(khri brgyad): kyad ni de mthob// de bzhin shes rab spyod mkhas byang chub sems dpa' yang // nam mkha' lta bu yin te nye bar zhi bar spyod// skye bo'i dbus na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snyam du// skye bo 'di mgu bya snyam
209b3(khri brgyad): mi sems de yang byed// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par byed mthong yang // de la lus med sems med ming yang yang ma yin// de bzhin shes rab spyod pa dam yang 'di skar du// byang chub rtogs
209b4(khri brgyad): nanas 'gro ba yongs su dgrol mi sems// skye ba sna tshogs dang ni bya ba mang ldan pa// snyam lta bu ston kyang rnam par mi rtog spyod// dper na sangs rgyas sprul pa sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed// byed pa de la
209b5(khri brgyad): drags pa cung zad sbyim 'gyur// de bzhin shes rab spong ma pas byang chub sems dpa' yang // sprul pa sgyu ma bzhin du bya ba thams cad ston// shing ma ben pab zab mkhas pas skyes pa bud med dang / 
209b6(khri brgyad): dra nga'i bzo byas de yang bya ba thams cad byed// de bzhin shes rab stong ma pas byang chub sems dpa' yang // rnam pa mi rtog ye shes bya ba thams cad byed// de ltar sdong mkhas rnams pa
209b7(khri brgyad): tshogs mang po dag/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyag kyang 'chal bar byed// phyogs bcu'i
209b8(khri brgyad): mang// gang gA'i thung mnyam ning na sems can ji snyed pa// de kun yongs su brtag pa bzung ste bdung byung la// ba s+phu nya gar las kyang de skad sprul byas kyang // de dag kun gyis mkhas la ba
210a1(khri brgyad): chang byami nus// rgyu rnam pa ni yis byang chub sems dpa' ma khas stobs ldan// b.rung sani mdzu bar na pa zhing bskyod par mi nus te// stong par gnas dang sems can ma / 
210a2(khri brgyad): su me gtong dang // ji skad smras bzhin byed dang bde gshegs byin rlabs can// de bzhin gshegs yum nas rab pha rol phrin pa 'di// 'chang tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mos byed cing // 
210a3(khri brgyad): bsam pa zag pas bsgrub par mngon par brtson byed na// nges pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzhugs rig bya// chos dbyangs de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing // dper na bar snang smin
210a4(khri brgyad): bzhin gnas pa med par riganas/ rig sngags 'chang ba gnas med mkhar rgyu gnas 'dod pa// sngags mthus dus min me tog ldan cing byin gyis rlob// de ltar spong pa byang chub sems
210a5(khri brgyad): dpa' mkhas gsal ba// rtogs par byed dang sangs rgyas chos rnams dmigs mi 'gyur// 'chang bar byed dang chos 'dod lta bar byed mer migs// 'di ni na 'did yon tan dkri ba'i
210a6(khri brgyad): gnas pa yin// dgra bcom na mthar de banir gshegs kyi ma gtogs par// gnas pa 'don tan thos nga rgyal bcas pa ye// gnas pa zhi bi'i ting 'dzin rab de bde ldan pa// ji snyed dun
210a7(khri brgyad): kyi mchog dang god na med pa yin// mang ba chags mkha' la gnas kyu ltung bar 'gyur ma'i na// nyani chub gnas kyang nga chubs te 'chi ba med// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsam
210a8(khri brgyad): gtan stobs dag zhes// pha ram san pa srong gnas myang ngan 'dang mi 'gyur// sems can kur ma nan mchad du grib nga// pas rgyam logs mchog tu mang byung mchog
210b1(khri brgyad): reg dang // chos kyi sbyin pa rang mchog dam pa sbyin 'dod gang // phan mdzad rnams kyi gnas mchog 'ardal bsten par byes// bslal pa'idon 'dren pas bslab pa mangs 'arjod na// bslang pang skyed
210b2(khri brgyad): gyi mchog dang god na med// mkhas pa gang zhig bslob kun pa rob 'gru'ado pas// sangs rgyas bsgrub pa shes rab pa ros phyin 'dir slongs// 'di na tshas gtor mchog dang chos mdzod ngam pa yin/ 
210b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rigs yin 'gro ba'i bdeng skyid pa'i mdzod// 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams// de dag 'di las 'thungs kyang chos dbyings zang mi shes// shing sa sras bu me tog nags
210b4(khri brgyad): tshal ji snying ba// de dag thams cadas las yang dag byung zhing la//  kyangs la za pa med cing jal 'ches// yongs su mi nyams rnam par mi rtog stso med// sangs rgyas sras da nyan thos sa
210b5(khri brgyad): rgyal lha rnams dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bde snying chos rnams ji snyed pa// de dun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung // shes rab rnams kyang zad pa yod cing 'phel ba med// sems can tham 'bring
210b6(khri brgyad): mchog srung ni myod pa// dedun ma rig las byung 'di ba ga shegs pasagasang+yas// rkyen rnams gas sas gapasngal rtul 'khor sa tu 'byung // man 'phrul la po ni bad med 'brel ba med/ 
210b7(khri brgyad): me shes tshul sgothabs dang rtsa ba snyed pa// de kun shes rab pa ro phyin pa mchog las byung // rkyen rnams cho mas na salas kyi 'bral 'khor rab tu 'byung // shes rab pha rol phyin lnga zang med 'brel ba
210b8(khri brgyad): 'phro bas mun pas la ltar// ma rig zings po bcom nas
211a1(khri brgyad): rang byung thob par 'gyur// mthutshon ldan pa bsam gtan pazhes kyang gnas byed la// brten par byeng ba ma yin gnas par byed pa med// 'on kyang bsam gtan spyan lag pa
211a2(khri brgyad): pa bzhi po 'di// byang chub dam pa mchog thob pa yi rten du 'gyur// shes rab mchog thob bsam gtan dag la gnas pa ni// gzugs med ting 'dzin dam pa pan yang nyams su myong // bsam
211a3(khri brgyad): gtan 'di dag byang chub dam pa mchog la phan// byang chub sems dpa' zag bzang phyir slob pa min// 'di ni yon tan sogs pa'i ngo mcher rmad byung ste/ bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin la gan
211a4(khri brgyad): ras mtshan ma med// de la gnas rnams gal te lus mi zhig gyur na// bsam pa ji bzhin 'dod pa'i khams su yang skye'o// dper na 'dzem gling mi zhig sngon chad lha yul gyi// lha'i grong khyer
211a5(khri brgyad): mchog tu ma phyir phyis songo ste// den yongs su zung maza 'i rnams mthong nas// phyir 'dir 'ong bar gyur na chags par mi byed ltar// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog 'ching // 
211a6(khri brgyad): rnal 'byor brtson te bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas nas// phyir yang 'dod pa'i khams su gnas te chags pa med// chu yi pad ma bzhin du byis pa'i chos mi gnas// bdag nyid chen po
211a7(khri brgyad): sems can yongs su smin bya dang // zhing spyod pha rol phyin rdzogs don byed khonar zus/ byang chub yon tan pha rol phyin nyams 'gyur 'od nus// gzugs med khams su skye ba don du
211a8(khri brgyad): gnyer mi byed// dper na memi zhig rin chen kotar rnams byung gyur nas// de la 'dod pa'i drin myed par ma byas pa// de kyangs lan nin ra de dag yangs grangs shig/ ngas nas
211b1(khri brgyad): kyi du tshogs par mi bye su na du byang chub sems dpa mnas padaga' bas// bangs chubasam gtan 'dzin na pa pa nas// bsam gtan pad ldan pasam gtan teng
211b2(khri brgyad): gtang ste// 'grol snying bacher ldan pa'i phyir yang 'dod khams 'jug/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'i ti 'dzin pasam gtan gnas// dgra bcom rang rgyal theg par 'dod pa'i blo bsrung na// mnyam par
211b3(khri brgyad): ma bzhag rgod cing sems g.yengs gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan yongs nyams mnyan pa kru zhig bzhin// gzhan yang gzugs dang sbrad de bzhin dri nga ro// reg dang 'dod yon lnga la mngon par 'tshor
211b4(khri brgyad): kyang dgub co la rgyal cag phral byang chub sems dag // dpa' bo rtag tu mnyam pa dag yin par shes pa ga// sems can gang cig gnan gyi sems dpa' rnam dag pa// bcor 'grus
211b5(khri brgyad): man sngon rnam pa grus/ me bye po du chun pA// de nas rnams sems nadun gying gis gro// slo ba byas ma ma te ga tu dgas //  pa'in
211b6(khri brgyad): gcig pa la la khyed pa sgyur// bsam pathag pas rnam pa'i skyes gnas par gyis// byang chub sems dpas sa 'dis su semamam ci// 
212a1(khri brgyad): sams canadon dran srung rnam 'byung // spos ldan mas srubs gyu ma/ na pa ni bus pa 'i byon ldan gal // byang chub sems dpa ma ma
212a2(khri brgyad): bskal pa bye ba bgrang // gal te ring bar 'du shes sdug bsngal byang chub sgrub// yang dag chos sgrub byed tshe yu ring sdug bsngal 'gyur// des ni brtson 'grus pha rol phyen nyams le lo can// byang chub
212a3(khri brgyad): mchog tu sems bskyed dang po nas bzung ste// byang chub bla na med pa thob par 'gyur gyi bar// nyin mtshan gcig tsam du ni yid la sems byed na/ namakhas pa gsal bas brtson 'grus brtsams par
212a4(khri brgyad): rig par bya// gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad ri rab ri bshig pa'i// rjes la byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes smra ba las// ci ste skyo ba'i blo bskyed tshad kyang sems byed na// de tsha byang chub sems dpa'
212a5(khri brgyad): le lor gyur pa yin// ji snye de ni 'di tsam chod lta ci dka' zhes// skad cig tsapa la ri ngas thal bar brlag sems bskyed// byang chub sems dpa babs pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste// ring po mi thas
212a6(khri brgyad): 'dren pa'i byang chub mchog theb 'gyur// 'gro ba yongs su smin par byas nas don gyi zhes// gapa te lus dang ngag dang yid kyis brtson byed de// bdag tu 'du shes gnas pas le lor gyur pa ste/ 
212a7(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring 'gyur gnam sa bzhin// gang tshe lus dang sems dang sems can 'du shes med// du shes rnam par log nas gnyis su med chos spong // 'di ni byang chub 'i
212a8(khri brgyad): bsi thams mchog 'ang pa'i// can bgrus pa ros phyin ces pan mdzad pas gsus// gal te gzhan pam ngan brjod cog nub rtso krung ma// bdag pa de le zhes byang chub mams
212b1(khri brgyad): mtsham pa dgal/ bsgras mam ga gis ga shigag nga// ma mas kyin ga na sa pa sa// byang chu sems ga na
212b2(khri brgyad): stong gsum rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams dang dgra bcom dang rgyal phul byas pa// sbyin pa'i phung pos de la bsod nams tur mi pong// bzod la gnas pa'i lus ni yongs su sa
212b3(khri brgyad): 'gyur te// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang mthu spobs pa mtha' yas// sems can rnams la chos rab stong pa sgrogs par byed// 'di ni bzod rgyan de la 'gro ba dag 'gyur mkhas// gal te sems
212b4(khri brgyad): can lags dang sur ma blangs// rig gas byang chub sems dpapalani drug byed pa// gnan zhi me mdag mags tshang bye gcig pa// de mas mnyama'i rnams pa mi ming ni bskyed par bya/ 
212b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas de ltar bzod byas nas// sems bskyed de 'ini byang chub mchog tu yangs bsngos na// dpa' 'a 'jig rten kun la bzod pas dgra bcom dang // rang rgyal sems can
212b6(khri brgyad): khams cang de skyed pag kyis gno// bzod byed 'di sam du bar sems ni bskyed cu ste// sems dbul du krigashin rje 'jig rten sug bsngal mapa/ 'dodana'i yod tan rnaM sa dbang med gan
212b7(khri brgyad): byang chub ched da khyo ya thAs ga ban sa grupa / mig gang pa nga na sa stegs/ klu hrI/ ma 'i snang lagags
212b8(khri brgyad): snyam pa// byang chub sems dpa bzang pa'i ra 'i rkyen la gdas// tshul khrims kyis ni nang ba du rnams 'phags par 'gyur// sebs bcu'i spyod yul gnas shing rdul khrims rnams pa
213a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin spyod pa nyams// ci ste byang chub zhib mchog tu yongs bsngon/  'di yon brtson lang tshul khrims pa ros sbyin sa gnas// chos gang dres pa'i byang chub yon tan 'byung 'gyur ba// 'di
213a2(khri brgyad): na chos ldan rnams kyi tshul khrims don// chos gang phan byed rnams kyi byang chub yongs nyams pa// 'di ni tshul khrims 'tshal ces rnam par 'dren pas gsungs// gal te byang chub sems
213a3(khri brgyad): dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun skyabs song ste/ sangs rgyas 'grub bya snyam du kun mkhyen yid byed na// mkhas pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin gnas
213a4(khri brgyad): she bar bya// gal te bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las lam bcu// spyod kyang dgra bcom rang rgyal nyid la 'dod pa skyed na// de tshe tshul khrims skyon byung tshul khrims nyams pa yin// sems bskyedade
213a5(khri brgyad): ni phas pham pas kyang shin du s+ho// tshul khrims srung zhing byang chub mchog tu yongs bsngol// de yis rlom sems med cing bdag bstod mi byed la// de ye 'du shes sems can 'du shes yongs/ 
213a6(khri brgyad): su spangs// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims pa des phyin gnas brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i lam spyod pa/ 
213a7(khri brgyad): zhes/ sna tshogs 'du shes zhugs pa shin du tshul khrims 'tshal// tshul khrims nyams shing de la yongs dag tshul khrims med// gang la bdag gi 'du shes sems can 'du shes
213b1(khri brgyad): med 'du shes 'dod chags bral la sdom min gal yod// gang lnga sdom dang sgom pa ma yin rlol sems med// 'di ni tshul khrims sdol par rnam par dzin pas gsungs// sems can dag pa dang / 
213b2(khri brgyad): zhige de ltar khrims ldan pa// sdug dang mi sdug sun la lta ba med pa yin// mgo dang rkang lag gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems kyang med// bdog pa thams cad stong zhing rtag tu zhen pa med// chos rnams nga
213b3(khri brgyad): bzhin bdag med ya ma rlar shes nas// bdag gi sha yang gtong zhing zhum pa'i sems med na// de tshe phyi rol dngos po gtong ba smos ci dgos// gal te ser sna byed pa de ni gnas med do// bdag tu 'du shes
213b4(khri brgyad): dngos la bdag gir 'dzin pas chags// blun po rnams la gtong ba'i blo lta ga la yod// ser sna can ni yi dgas gnas su skye bar 'gyur// ci ste mir skyes ni ying de tshe dbul por 'gyur// de tshe byang chub
213b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems ca dbul shes nas// gtong la mos par 'gyur zhing rtag tu lhag par gtong // gling bzhi legs par brgyan pa mchil mamo thal ba 'dra// byin nas dga' bar bgyur gyi sri po
213b6(khri brgyad): relu min// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gsal ba srid gsum gyi// sems can ji snyed de dag kun la sbyin pa 'di// phyin par gyur cig snyam du bsams nas spyir byin la/ 
213b7(khri brgyad): don phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo// sbyin pa byin nas dngos la gnas par byed pa med// de ni nam du'ang rnam par smin la re ba med// de ltar gtor la mkhas pa thams cad stong pa ste// chung ngu btang
213b8(khri brgyad): la mang po dpag tu med par 'gyur// phreng po gsum na sems can mal pa ji snyed pa// yongs su brtag par bzung ste dag thams cad kyis// 'jig rten mkhyen pa sangs rgyas dgra bcomar
214a1(khri brgyad): rgyal la// bskal pa mtha' yas sbyin byin nyan thos legs tshol na// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa thabs mkhas gang zhig gis// de dag bsod nams bya ba'i dngos la mi
214a2(khri brgyad): ranganas// sems can don du byang chub mchog rab yongs pasngon// yongs su bsngos pas 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis gnor// nor bu mching bu'i phung po chen por gyur pa yang // rin chen
214a3(khri brgyad): r+yagacig de kun zil gyis gnon// de bzhin 'gro kun sbyin pa'i phung po rgya chen kun// rjes su yi rang byang chub sems dpas zil gyis gnon// gal te byang chub sems dpas 'gro la sbyin phyin
214a4(khri brgyad): nos// de la bdag gir mi byed dngos pa sangs med na// de las dge ba'i rtsa ba ma chen 'phel 'gyur te// sprin med 'od ldan na dkyil yar gyi ngo bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i
214a5(khri brgyad): dwags 'gro ba gcod// dbul ba dang 'i de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad gcod// spyod tshe longs spyod mtha' yas rgyas pa thob par 'gyur// sbyin pas sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can
214a6(khri brgyad): yongs smin byed// khrims kyis dud 'gro'i 'gro ba du ma'i ngo bo dang // mi khom brgyad spong de yis dal brtag tu rnyed// bzod pas gzugs bzang dam pa rgya chen thob 'gyur te// gser ma
214a7(khri brgyad): sdug cing 'gro ba'i lta bas 'os su 'gyur// brtson 'grus kyis ni dkar po'i yon tan 'grib mi 'gyur// ye shes mtha' yas rgyal ba'i bang mdzod rnyed par 'gyur/ 
214a8(khri brgyad): 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dor// rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par sgrub// shes rab kyis ni chos kyi rang bzhin yongs shes nas// khams gsum ma lus pa la
214b1(khri brgyad): spya /  bar 'gyur// mi yi tshon ma ma chi chen bsnod byas nas nan sug brgyal zad par bya byi ga ng+gA ba chos kyang na//  pa ma rdzogs bya ba sa pa / 
214b2(khri brgyad): yol / zhem mas can dgapa sem //  na cing rjes su dzen// de zhin dge sa can yos su /  da gas mang bskan
214b3(khri brgyad): mchog gyur pas// shes rab bstan pa byang chub lam ldan 'dag sungs te/ mi ni yon tan ri rer sdung pa byang chub lam// la ma'i sems can thun gyisarlob par bya phyir ba dang // 'phags pa shes
214b4(khri brgyad): rkyen pa ci rgya nga mas/  ma zhes rgyaste/  // la ba sa brjo rgya me gas mas
214b5(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i'adi dag gsungs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor pa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
214b6(khri brgyad): patshal ba 'i rigs kyi bang gas kyi bu mangs//  DU byung chub sems pa'i sem chen po ga d+hA / daltar de bzhin gshegs pa datha bcom pa yang sa par rdzogs
214b7(khri brgyad): rgyas sgra dbyed sa mi bzad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyang po spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bcal bar bya'o// de skad ces pas stsal pa
214b8(khri brgyad): dngo/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'das ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog tu dus/ shes rab kyil rol tu phyin pa
215a1(khri brgyad): yongs su tshol ba na ji lta yongs su btsal lags/ de skad ces gsol bdag bcom ldan tsha ldan pa'ab 'byor la 'ang skad tsas bka' byam to// byang chub sems da
215a2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su tshol ba na// lus la cher cher mi 'dzin/ srog la ma lta/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par
215a3(khri brgyad): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na/ bar snang la sgra zos par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shes/ 
215a4(khri brgyad): dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis// ji nas lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / gtad dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ 
215a5(khri brgyad): bdang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / grang ba yid la byed pa ma bskyed pa dang / chab yid la byed pa mi bskyed
215a6(khri brgyad): pa de lar song shig/ rang dang phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yas g.yon du ma blta bar song cig/ nabya dang / byang dang / sreng dang 'og dang / phyogs mtshams
215a7(khri brgyad): su yang ma blta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bci nas 'jig chags las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci nas gzugs pas byang ma g.yos pa dang / ce nas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
215a8(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song nag// gang 'di las g.yos bde ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// celas nyams par 'gru nan/ sangs rgyas
215b1(khri brgyad): the chos rnams pas nyams par 'gyur po// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnamapa las nyams par 'gyur ma na 'do ba na so// gang 'khor ba la smom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rjes su me
215b2(khri brgyad): 'thob bo// desad ces smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe chen po rnyog tu dus sma 'i 'di skad ces smrams// de cazhin du bya mo/ de tsen phyi zhem/ bdag ni sems can thams cad la
215b3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// ji ska chos smras pa dang / snyi sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul 'di skad ces smras sa/ 
215b4(khri brgyad): rtag tu du legs so legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus kyang spro thos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
215b5(khri brgyad): chos dag la mos pa bskyed la// shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa yos su brtsal bar byamo// khyod kyim mtshan mamangs su spang bang bya/ dam tha yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can du lta ba yongs su
215b6(khri brgyad): bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs pa dag spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i nazhes gcen yang dag stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang
215b7(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa dang / ma 'gags pa'i chos rnams ston pa dag lasnyen par bya// bsnyen par bya// bsnyen ra 'bya mo/ 
215b8(khri brgyad): ne pa glegs bam du chung pa'am/ dge slong chom smra ba'i lus la yong pa thos par 'gyur te// rigs kyi dug pa las shes rab kyi pha rong tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la rigs kyi
216a1(khri brgyad): ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing khyod kyis byas pa gzob dang / byas pa tshor bar bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'de thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen
216a2(khri brgyad): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bdag gi sathos pas/ myur du blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
216a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi rim pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa
216a4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lan lon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la/ dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang
216a5(khri brgyad): pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis// dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i// khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba las chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// 
216a6(khri brgyad): khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sA dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa
216a7(khri brgyad): bsnyen pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar sgrub ste/ re dag des zil gyis mnan nas thabs la mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsten pa dang / bsnyen par byed pa'ang mdod// rigs kyi bu khyong
216a8(khri brgyad): dge slong ches smra ba de lo ma dad pa bskyod par me / gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'din thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so// 
216b1(khri brgyad): 'din sems can gtul ba'i tshur gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la bsten cing 'grogs te/ bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems
216b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa'am/ sgrib pa med kyis skad cig khyo rigs kyi 'a khyod nyid kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chocha rnams kyi
216b3(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir ne na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med
216b4(khri brgyad): srog med pa gang cag med pa/ snyam lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ brag ca lu bu/ mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i phyir 'brang na ring po mi thems par shes
216b5(khri brgyad): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgan na yang rigs kyi 'a khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms sreg/ rigs kyi zugal ta chos su bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bral
216b6(khri brgyad): par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir dbyed par mi bya ste/ gnan dun chos don du gcer ba nyid ngas/ chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang / yid mi skyobs dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi ba nin 'bra
216b7(khri brgyad): bya nas thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog tu dus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa'i byangs nas/ shar phyogs gal badrang song ba dang / 
216b8(khri brgyad): bdag gis snang yang zing du 'gro bar byab madris so snyam nas/ des phyogs de nyid na du nang byang na byed de sme 'ing 'dug go// des khyonas de na nyin zhag gcig 'das par byed// nyin nag gnyim sa ma/ 
217a1(khri brgyad): gsuH'am/ 'ad nas kyang zhes rab kyis ba tu phyin ba thos par ma gyur bya du mus ngal pa yang la byed pa ma bskyed/ rmugs sang pa gnyid yid la byed pa mi bskyo
217a2(khri brgyad): bza' ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ btung ba yid la byed pa ma bsgred/ mtshan mor yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ nyin mor yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ che ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed do/ 
217a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na/ sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ re lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa 'byung ba ma
217a4(khri brgyad): gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang de'i tshe/ bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snya
217a5(khri brgyad): pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig
217a6(khri brgyad): bzhugs nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshig de skad smra ba legs selags so// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
217a7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di dang / spro ba
217a8(khri brgyad): 'di dang / 'dod du gnyer ba'i'adi dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bus rjes su 'brang zhing / shar phyogs nyid du songango shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag ched lnga brgyan/ sdom ldan zhes bya ba'i phreng khyer rin bachi lnga

218a1(khri brgyad): / nga/ de sems ca sa na 'an ngas d+hu// rlung thams cad kyang ma ul sa mas bang ma dgang bdagags pasas matag rigs che nga

218a3(khri brgyad): yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rnam par bkra zhing yun sprul pa na stab ste/ phyed mos tsha la de dag re re napa rjed bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya
218a4(khri brgyad): rdzing bu de dag gi khor yul thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog ud pal dang / ku mu dang / pad ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug par la skyes te/ re dag gis chu de khebs shing / me tog
218a5(khri brgyad): ud pa la dang / ku mu dang / pad mdakar po de dag thams cad kyang chu nang ngu shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste/ sngon po kha dog sngon po/ sngon po lta bur ston pa/ bang sngon po 'byung ba/ ser po/ kha dog ser po
218a6(khri brgyad): ser po la bur smyon pa/ 'od ser po 'byung ba/ dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar po lba bur ston pa/ 'od dmar po 'byung la rakar po kha dag dkar po// dkar po lta bur ston pa/ 'od dkar po 'byung ba
218a7(khri brgyad): ngag yang do// rjeng phre dag thams cad ma/ ra nga/ khru byung sa bya ga na dang / bded sgra dzin pa ga yang po/ skyed mod nal dag thams dang mi nga ba med cing/ ris
218a8(khri brgyad): bcang ba med de/ 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / yun ring por chos zab mo lams pa'i sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas

218b3(khri brgyad): mo satshal dang / mya ngan med ces bya ba dang / mya ngan bral shes bya ba dang / me toge sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/ spyad mas tshal de dgar ren yang rje
218b4(khri brgyad): bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde 'a zhes bya ba dang / bod ldan zhes bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba
218b5(khri brgyad): brkyang brgyad yod de/ rdzing bu dag gis ngos gcig ni gser las byas/ ros gnyis pa ni dngul las byas ros gsum pa ni bai DUr+ya las byas/ rom bzhi pa ni shel las byas/ nang gis gzhi ni ke ke ru la/ 
218b6(khri brgyad): gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste/ rdzing bu de dag re re la yang / them skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas 'argyan pa brgyad brgyad yong ngo de/ them skas de ngag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang 'jam pa'i
218b7(khri brgyad): bo'i gser gyi shing ldan pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ku mur dang / ud pa la dang / papra ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing / rang dur dang / khrung thung dang / bzhad
218b8(khri brgyad): mas skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor lul tu me tog gi shing rnab pa sna tshogs skyes te/ shing nga dag la rlung gis bskyong ba dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lung bas/ rdzing dbu de tham
219a1(khri brgyad): na 'i dru nga tsan dan gyi'i daphyogs shi bdag dang ldan/ dri dang gyur ro// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'byor dang bcas pa bud med drug / khri brgyad stong dang ldan/ 
219a2(khri brgyad): cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lda nga ldan ning 'byir / rtse dga' ni dga' mthur skyed do// zab kya de na sems can skye tha pa dang 'ang ma ga gzhan dgag bong pa de dag thams cad kying skyeng mos tshal 'am/ 
219a3(khri brgyad): dbu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i'abor rnams dang rgya
219a4(khri brgyad): / cig tu rtse dga' ste/ dga' mgur spyod cing den dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grob khyer spos ldan da 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi ba ni mdo byang
219a5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba/ snyan nang tshangs
219a6(khri brgyad): can bting ba sted snying po rgyan du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i ras bting ba/ 'bang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa pa rtsams te/ steng gi bar snang la rab kyi bla re mu tig gi sna brgyan pa bres shing / de ltar chos pa
219a7(khri brgyad): gus par byed pas sa phyogs pa por sug gyung / me tog kha dog sA lnga pa dag mngon par gtod rnyings phyogs de yung spros sna tshogs dang / bradag pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu 'dug par byed do// des kya
219b1(khri brgyad): sems su rgyun du rgyas 'phags mas shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pazhan// don gang dag tan pa lha ma srog chags brgya brag mang 'ad srog chags stong phrag meng pa dang / sog chags 'a
219b2(khri brgyad): blag mang po tshogs pa de dag las/ la la ni lu do/  la ni 'don kyim/ lal ni mi zher gyi/ lal ni tshul bzhin 'di byed pas snyogs par byed do/ sems can dedas thams cad kyang mogo par mi byung / 
219b3(khri brgyad): chos can de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa na stag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chom 'phags di'i lung du song shig dang / de las na parab kyi
219b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po rlos khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rdzogs par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ 
219b5(khri brgyad): gang dag par gzeng stong pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bum chung brjod par myod nge ltar tshog pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su batshal gyis/ rigs kyi gu rbod nyin mtshar

219b7(khri brgyad): mdu ying rangs rab kyi ma 'ing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur ba 'di lta ste/ dbang na skyes bu med 'a drug can rigags po'o na mid po pyod pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi/ gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar
219b8(khri brgyad): ba pyad pa/ phyag du 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du/ khyong chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang / gang bdag la gas
220a1(khri brgyad): dbyas par byed ci/ chos gang tses nas padag ga dmigs pa sa sris tshogs kyi sa da gyi ma mas sa ga mgangs
220a2(khri brgyad): yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtog tu dus phyogs de nyid du dug ste/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgod ma mngon du
220a3(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya
220a4(khri brgyad): pa'i ting nge 'dziran dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya
220a5(khri brgyad): pa nyid nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi nus pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // chos thams cad mi dmigs pa nas byaba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
220a6(khri brgyad): chos thams cad bdag gis dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bslab pa zhes bya ba'i
220a7(khri brgyad): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon
220a8(khri brgyad): pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dir dang / sems can thams cad kyi sbrul mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya bya'i ting dzin dang / sma dang tshig dang / 'bru sna tshogs bsgrub pa
220b1(khri brgyad): nyid sangam / ma'angs pa nas gyu nga rdzun dang / rangam rnam pa lus pa zhes byab ha nga na dang / sgrub dpar rnam pa sa nas bya la na / 
220b2(khri brgyad): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med
220b3(khri brgyad): pa'i mthar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sal ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa
220b4(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byi mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin// 
220b5(khri brgyad): dang / seng ge mngon par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun ras nyon mongs
220b6(khri brgyad): meng pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // 
220b7(khri brgyad): sa thams cad pas mngon par phags pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dpa/ mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las ras pa
220b8(khri brgyad): gas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting bang ngon dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzin dang / lwa bar gyur pa thibs po// 
221a1(khri brgyad): thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes byab ta 'angan dang / mun pa dang myal nas gyu ti sa na dang man rgya / 
221a2(khri brgyad): thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes pa ba'i ting nge dzin dang / le la thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thab mo thong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / ring 'dra ba'i zhes bya hrI ti
221a3(khri brgyad): dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting dzin nga/ 'dud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par mnan pa zhem b+ha ba ci
221a4(khri brgyad): 'a zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dpozhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya 'i ting mdzin rnams mngon du gyur te/ rdo ting nge 'dzin dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu 'ji shes
221a5(khri brgyad): khams rnams ma/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems papa'i chen po dag la shesas kyi ma pyid 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong sa/ 
221a6(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa dras gis legs sanas byab byi rgyamang dus pa mdzu rkyena'i mang ba gsu surig kyi kyis sngo byang chub sems dpa 'i snang btsung pa ma
221a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin du btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na yang ting nge 'dzin ring dag thob ste/ 
221b1(khri brgyad): s+yA pa'am/ gang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya ba'i chos dgang yang yang dag par rjes sum mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu'idi ni shes rab kyi
221b2(khri brgyad): phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis kyang rlob sems ma chos sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i 'alus gser gyi kha dog lnga du thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
221b3(khri brgyad): rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od bdom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam g+hi mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / sangs rgya
221b4(khri brgyad): yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs padag gis kyang ched gzung ba'am/ mtha' bldan par mi nug na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
221b5(khri brgyad): ngag gis pa ci smos/ rigs kyi bu lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang / bdun pas rus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dun pa la
221b6(khri brgyad): blablabu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// khyod kyis dge pa'i bzhes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyod par bya'o// pangs par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
221b7(khri brgyad): yongs su zin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasnga ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de napa de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la
221b8(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi dge ba'i pashes pa nyen yang lags de ngag kyis rol
222a1(khri brgyad): / kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dzin po chos 'phags kyis blan ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya
222a2(khri brgyad): yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la bslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyis/ des byed la ji sa ba sa
222a3(khri brgyad): bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa 'am// bskal pa gnyis sam// bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa
222a4(khri brgyad): stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la thong bzhin du thogs shing / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te/ srong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gzugs dang
222a5(khri brgyad): swa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad yul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi bu'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge'adzin 'di lta bu dag
222a6(khri brgyad): par gyur te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // thabs la mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sem
222a7(khri brgyad): dnga' chen pa cag tu dur thugs byung nas mi sdang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin dag las langs te/ langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
222a8(khri brgyad): gang nas byor// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste// de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de shing snyam du sems

222b2(khri brgyad): gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngan par song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa
222b3(khri brgyad): dag gang nas byon de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos

222b5(khri brgyad): chen po chos 'phags ri'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te/ gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am/ gser
