299b1(khri brgyad): bad/ 'dugs dang / 'byed dmapa dang/ rnam pa gas pa tu gsas// tsun pa pa ma na sa ga zu rnamam mnapa@#/ napa
299b2(khri brgyad): dmigs lags / gzugasabla dgas byung chub sems dpa ga ba dang tu shesad/ kyad rnams/ shes pas na/ 'dun pa
299b3(khri brgyad): 'dubyad ngam sa dang / rnam par shes pa yang dasnga lags so// 'dun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni nas bkyi ba 'am/ man nas sakyis gtan me dmigs pags ni/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
299b4(khri brgyad): dang/ shes nga/ 'dubyed rnam pa dang// ldan pas su gzhan na
299b5(khri brgyad): 'das gzugs sunan pa nyin mongs zhes brtsab / rnam par byeng 'arnaMs pakyi ba gtan ma dmig gas sa dzad pas byang chub sems da phru ga
299b6(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa shes pa yang de lta lags so// 
300a1(khri brgyad): bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchi / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de lta sags so// btsun pa brtsa
300a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gzugs dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ tshor ba dang
300a3(khri brgyad): 'dugs dang / chu byed rnams dang / rnam par gsas yang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan das megagatan na tshigs lag ni/ mon na tshig bla dgas byang chub sem sa da ma rdzung bstan
300a4(khri brgyad): dpe khyer ba lhag/ rna ba dang lji sre / med kyang de rgya lags so// 'dun pa bcom ldan 'das mig pa zhes pakyipa gtan mi dmigs lags sa/ mig sdug bsnga
300a5(khri brgyad): bradags byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur ba rtag sa mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang sbed lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig dag mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ 
300a6(khri brgyad): mig bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig stong zhes
300a7(khri brgyad): sngags nas kyi/ mau ji po'i tshig bdag kyang chub sam sa par 'gyur ba lkug pacos sa myed sa me su shes ga/ rgyu ma
300a8(khri brgyad): ces zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig blad gis byang chub sems dpar
300b1(khri brgyad): bdud pa bcom ldan 'das mi gzhi zhes pakyi ba gtan mi dmigs lagasan/ mig man pa'i tshig bla dag byang chub lam 'dapa' 'grur ba lta cas/ rna ba dang snga dang rgyad 'a bus dang / yang kyang da stsa la gas
300b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das mig dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig mo dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa ltag la mchis/ rna ba dang snga dang lde dang lus dang / yid kyang de/ 
300b3(khri brgyad): lags so// badren pa bcom ldan das mi gsun nas nyan mongs pa zhes bkyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags sa/ ma garnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba stegs sachis/ rna ba dang sna
300b4(khri brgyad): lul dang / yid kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig skye zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rna ba dang sna dang lnga dang
300b5(khri brgyad): yid kyang ltalags sa// bdun pa bcom ldan da gdas pamachi zhes pakyim gtan med migs pagasan/ mag tshig gra dag sa byang chub sems dpar 'gyur balhag
300b6(khri brgyad): dban sngag lde sa dang / med kyang de snga lags so// 'dren pa com ldan 'das gzugs rnams gtan medamigs lagasas gzugs rtso bra dgas bya chub sems dpa' gyur ba sngag ma chi/ 
300b7(khri brgyad): dang mig pa dang /  mya ba de snga lags so// dran pa bcom ldan da ma pa// ga sa kyi ba gtan dam gas lagasas/ gzugs rnam ma rtog pa che bladags bya chub sems dpa'
300b8(khri brgyad): ga lamachis/ sprad drid yod reg pa dag yos nams kyad de lta lags so// thun pa bcom ldan nas gzugs rnams pa zhem bgyi ba gtan me dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams sdug pa sngal pa'i tshig bla dgas bya
301a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ sma dang drid podang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams dad ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags/ 
301a2(khri brgyad): na/ gzugs rnams bdag ma mchis pa'i chog bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ spra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams stong zhes/ 
301a3(khri brgyad): bkyi gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams ma spong ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ smad dridang po dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan/ 
301a4(khri brgyad): 'das gzugs rnams mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / 
301a5(khri brgyad): chos rnam pa kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams smon pa ma mchis zhes bkyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
301a6(khri brgyad): dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ spra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang des lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnamang ne zhes bgyi ba gtan med dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams ma'i
301a7(khri brgyad): ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so// 
301a8(khri brgyad): lags ma/ gzugs rnams mi ben pa chog bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba stag la mchis/ smad dri dang ning theg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lha lags so// btsun pamacom ldan 'das gzugs na
301b1(khri brgyad): nas tanam mnas pakyi ba gtan ma dmigs la gsas/ gzugs rnams rnam pa kyang cag pradag pa byang chu ba rtsams dpa 'gyur balhags sacham/ phrad phred yang reg pa dang / sa nasas kyang de
301b2(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dgas gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sem sad par 'gyur 'jug la mchos/ skad phre 'dong reg par
301b3(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ gzugs rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa
301b4(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ skadang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang / chos rnams kyang de lta lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gis khams gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang
301b5(khri brgyad): mas dag ces pakyi ga gtan mi dmig pa lags/ mig ga khams kyi rtag pa'i tshig gradags byang chub sems dpa gyu ba lhag la satsha/ gzugs kyi la mom dang / mig ni rnam par shes pa'i kham sa
301b6(khri brgyad): yi kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// banan pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams 'di nas pa kyi bgatan mi dmigs lags na/ mig grimams sdug bsngal pa'i tshig bla
301b7(khri brgyad): byang chub ma dpar gyur ba sngagam mchis/ gzugs kyi las pa dang / mad dmam par shes pa'i 'am pa nas/ yid khres par shes pa'i'am sa kyi bu lang de na du myar bar gyi'o/ 
302a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das tshig gi khams bdag mchis nas pargya ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mags khams bdag pa mchis pam chog bla dgas byang chub sams dpar 'gyur ba lhag la rdzam
302a2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyang bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams spong nis bkyi bag
302a3(khri brgyad): mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig ni rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par sa
302a4(khri brgyad): ba'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams mtshan ma mchis des bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dag
302a5(khri brgyad): / byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba snyed lo mchis/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// bdun pa
302a6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das mig gi khams smon pa mchis zhes kyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mig gi khams smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lhag ma mchis/ gzugs kyi lams
302a7(khri brgyad): dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams ni zhes bkyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags
302a8(khri brgyad): mig gi khams ma ni nga'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ gzugs kyi sems dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang
302b1(khri brgyad): 'dzi dus+yAng bar bgyi'o// dra pa la na sa yig ge ba pa ga pa gas lagasan/ mig gi 'ams can pan pa chag bladags byang chub sems dpar gyur bsngags sacas/ gzugs kyi
302b2(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs
302b3(khri brgyad): lags de/ mig gi khams dam par bya 'i tshig bla dgas bya chub sems dpar gyur lkug sa mtsham/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi kha gas pa'i khams nas/ mid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ba
302b4(khri brgyad): dulang de bzhi du sbya bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnams skye nas bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs migasar/ mig gi khams 'gag mchog bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lkugs mchis
302b5(khri brgyad): thugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pa du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcon ldan 'das mig gi khams dngos po mchis zhes bgyis
302b6(khri brgyad): na ni dmigs pa gas na/ mig gi ng+yas das po mchis pa'i tshig gra gas bya chu bsas dpang gyu ga / gzugs kyi meng / mig rnas pa shes mas da kyi la
302b7(khri brgyad): mas kyi bar du yang de bzhin du spang bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rig pa gtan mi dmigs lags na/ mi rig pa'i tshig bla dgis byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lhag la mchis/ rga shi'i bdum de bzhim
302b8(khri brgyad): la sa// ldan pa pa ma ug pas ga bad+ha ces kyi gtan med migs lags sa/  ga pa ga pa rig gradags bya nub mas par sung balhags mchis/ mag sa yul sa
303a1(khri brgyad): bar babya'o// mun pa btsa ldan 'das ma ga pa pade nas pakyi bgatan med mig pa lags na/ sa rin pa sdug 'asngal ba chog bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lhag pa mchil/ rga shi na
303a2(khri brgyad): du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar 'gyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa bdag ces pakyi lagatan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la ma
303a3(khri brgyad): shing bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lag pan/ ma rig pa mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba ltag la mchis/ 
303a4(khri brgyad): dashi'i ba du yang de bzhin du sbyor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems da / 
303a5(khri brgyad): ra lcagalasacag/ ni go'i 'dus de bzhin du sa bar 'gyi'o// 'dun pa 'aso ldan 'dam ma dag pa smon mtshas nas kyib gtan ma dmigs pags sa/ mngon pa smon pa ma mchis pa'i chog 'dag pa
303a6(khri brgyad): chub sems dpar gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar 'dri'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ni rnas bkyi pa gtan mi dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa ma ni ba'i tshig blags
303a7(khri brgyad): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga sha'i bar duyang de bzhin du sbyar bar bkye'o// btsun pa
303a8(khri brgyad): gyur ba lhag la mchis na shi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// bdun pa bcom ldan 'das sa rig pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes pakyi ba gtan me dmigs lags na/ ma rig pa rnam pa
303b1(khri brgyad): rgab sems dpar dgyur ba lhag la mchis/ na shi'i ba du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa skyenas bkyil gtan ma migs lags na/ ma rig pa 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas bya chu
303b2(khri brgyad): da' 'gyur ba lhag la mchis/ na she'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar bar 'gyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dngos po mchi zhes pakyi gtan mi dmigs pags na/ ma rig pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dag
303b3(khri brgyad): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ rga shi'i bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar b.rab gyi ste/ phung po'i skabs su ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad rgya cher slar bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
303b4(khri brgyad): legs so lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dag pa 'i dmigs de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i sa kyi mid bla dgra mi dgye
303b5(khri brgyad): da zhi rtso dang du ga 'du byed rnam pa dang / rnam par shes pa ga bradags mid mag na da na / ma pa shes pa 'di sa bcad pa sa kyi tshig ga sa meng migs de bzhin hA/ mag pa
303b6(khri brgyad): zadags med dmigs shing / gsho bar gyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med bar gyi tshig bla dgas me migs par phung po'i skabs su dza dang bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar byaste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
303b7(khri brgyad): la bcwab par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha ro du phyin pa zhi ba las/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas kyi 'dushes bya skyel pa'o// shA ra dwa ti bu kyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa shes 'gyi ba'i chos de bdag gis ya gnapa
303b8(khri brgyad): yul na ce yag sa tsha kyi tsham ya dag pa sa su gyi so// shA ts+li tshul gyi choms kyi ma sa nga // gtsun kyi sa kyi rgya
304a1(khri brgyad): lums nga// ar+g+ha byas kyis kyang gzugs kyathams la dag par rjes su mi mang// da na kyi gyi kyi kyang rnam par ses pa'i 'ams kyi bdang mang dag pa pas / 
304a2(khri brgyad): thong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ba gyis kyang chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shA rarA ti'i mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su me mthong ngo // chos kyi dbyings kyi sa / 
304a3(khri brgyad): ke gi khams yang dgu par rjes su ma mthong ngo // de bzhin du s+yA te/ yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rje su rdzo
304a4(khri brgyad): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi thong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes
304a5(khri brgyad): bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos kyi dbyings kyis yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus bya
304a6(khri brgyad): dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// shA ra pA'i bu 'dus byas lam gtogs par 'du bar
304a7(khri brgyad): byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus la/ 'dus mkhas kyi khams lam gtogs par yang 'dus byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA rA
304a8(khri brgyad): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par
304b1(khri brgyad): dumi mthong lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' shes pagyi bde be ni 'don gang pag ga de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa te brel
304b2(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi don ni gni med pa'i don no// de ci'i phyir ne na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gni don gyi bdag nyid med pa'i phyir te/ de lta bas dbyang chub
304b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gan drod ni gan me dang 'don to// shA ra dA ng+ge'i du ba la bya rnams kying med do// dag na byang chub sems dpa'i gan 'don med do// shAr tu'i bu ben gyi lam la gan med do// bA
304b4(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don medang// shA ra dwa ti bu dper na sna ma lagan med do// shA radA dwa 'bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gnong don med do// shA radA ta'i bu dper na sgeg rgyu lag ni med do// shA ra d+ya te
304b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gan 'don med do// de bzhin du brag cha dang / mig yod dang / chu blad dade/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skal pa la gni med do// shA ra ti'i bud bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gni 'dan med do// 
304b6(khri brgyad): bu ni pan nyid pa gni med do// de ba ni du mno bde bzhin te dang /  nyid pa cing kyi byang dag ca tsu ba ga mi /  ra ba byang du ba sem pad nan 'das
304b7(khri brgyad): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu dper na yang dag pa'i mthar lag ni med do// shA radwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gni 'don med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na su ma'i zhes bu'i gzugs kyi phung po la ga zhi mad do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i drang
304b8(khri brgyad): dang /  sha kyi drang pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po dang / rnam par shes pa'i da mam gan med do/ 
305a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du me kyi bar ma gan med do// de bzhin du ge/ gzugs kyi skye ma ched lagan med pa nas/ chos kyi skyes med dkyi ba la gan med// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gan 'don da/ 
305a2(khri brgyad): dado// de bzhin du sbya / sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid stong ba nyid kyi par la spyod pa la gzhi med do// ma slo sa zhe kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byung chu
305a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa'i gni 'don med do// shwa ra dA'i bu dper na sgyu ma skyes bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa la gzhi med do// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis
305a4(khri brgyad): rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gno'adon med do// de bzhin du s+ya te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa la gan me do// shA dwa ti'i bu de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems
305a5(khri brgyad): dang chen po shes rab kyi la ro du phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ga 'din med do// bA ra 'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la ga'i 'don na/ 
305a6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gni med do// shA ra ti bu de band du bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang nub sa // 
305a7(khri brgyad): dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gzhi'i 'don med do// de bzhin du yid kyi bar lag no'i don med do// shwa ra dwa ti bu
305b1(khri brgyad): sa rnab pas ma dpa ma pa na pa gas byapa rgyan pa la gnas na thams pa pa na /  can bzhan gshegs pa dag pa tsam pa sa dag pa na
305b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyin stong pa nyid la spyod pa la gni'i don med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la zheni 'don med do// shA raR+sha to bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
305b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shesangs kyi phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems da pa'i gzhi don myed do// shA ti'i bu dber na de bzhin ga shegs par gru tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dran she
305b4(khri brgyad): ga rnamapa la ga med do// da zhe hU~M/ ra sa ma bco rgya snrub sa bzhin me do// shA du gas sa da na ga
305b5(khri brgyad): sbyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gni 'don med do// shA ti'i bu dper na 'dus byas kyi khams la/ 'dus ma byas kyi 'ams kyig ni med do// 'dus sa byas kyi lams sa/ 'dus byas kyi 'ams kyig ni mi
305b6(khri brgyad): 'a pa zhe kya med la sems dpa chen pa shes kyi cho byin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhing donam do// hA rbA thu ba na mye ma pa la nani med // da zhin gag da
305b7(khri brgyad): man par byed pa med pa dang / babyung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kutsun nam me med pa dang / rnam par byu ba med pa gzhis do// nA t+yA'i bu ga shin byang chub sems dpa' ma
305b8(khri brgyad): nab ces pa phyin pa mnanasapa'i byang rnapams pad padzin na med // dan bco na masanapa shA // mun papa ma nas pan
306a1(khri brgyad): rnan pa sa pa na/  gzhananamanyan sa gang rnam pa#
306a2(khri brgyad): s+ya te/ gzugs kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa'i bar lagazhi med do// de brjin du cherab dang / du zhes dang / 'du byed rnapas dang / rnam par shes pa'i kun nas nyon mo sa pamed
306a3(khri brgyad): sa mamamaldan /  rgyas seM da// de ma rgyam mas smras /  gyu masu

306b1(khri brgyad): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa lagani mdang// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag gi skyeb med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa meng ba dang / rnam par byang bab
306b2(khri brgyad): gni med do// shA R+sha tI'i de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab gyi la ros tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang na ba be da pa medano// shA tI'i bu dper na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shen
306b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ba shin turnam par dag pa'i gan med do// shA ra to bu de bzhin byang nub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
306b4(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gni don med do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba/ bam pa drug pa/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin du rnam par
306b5(khri brgyad): ba la gni mad do// de bzhin du m+b+ha ha/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad shin tu rnam par dag pa lagani med do// shA ra rA ti'i byed pa ded byang nab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa rol tu phyin pa la gas
306b6(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu dper na bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med pa'i phyir sems
306b7(khri brgyad): can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed mas skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / byed pa po dang / spong ba pa dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes
306b8(khri brgyad): myong ba po rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do// shA d+ya dwa'i bu pa shin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nazhi'i don ma do/ 
307a1(khri brgyad): ti dru ba nam du tsun pa gnom /  na meng shin du rgya chu sems dpa' mas pa na mal gyil rdzo phyin pa gnam pa'i phyi dub sems
307a2(khri brgyad): da dod pa // shA bye bzhid du 'asreg pa'i bskas pa byung ban du byed du gcig parnams cad byin ni mod de// nga 'i bud ban byang chub sems dpar sems dpa chen pa gsar bkyi chos na
307a3(khri brgyad): gnas pa kyi chung ma pa yin ni 'dod medang// DU nan gshegs pa dag tsham pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i snang rgya kyi tshul khrim la la mtsha la mas byin
307a4(khri brgyad): de zhin du ma pa krol tsa'i ye shes 'byong ba'i phung pol la rnam par rgyam tsho pa zhes song ngam yin pa'ig ni med po// shA ni sri bzhin byang chub samam dpa sems pa chen po gas kyi yo phyin
307a5(khri brgyad): 'byeng chub sems dang mig ni 'don med do// bA ra d+ha ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'ad dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od la gni med do// de bzhin du sU haM/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / barbab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / bsgram

307a7(khri brgyad): byin pa ma ma ma ma na / da' bye sa/ shAng rgya'i gang pa dag bya lubs che ni de dag tsho kyi ga sad ba pa mam

307b2(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dri skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang lags pa
307b3(khri brgyad): chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma lags/ mi ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs ma mchim pa bstan du ma mchis pa thogs pa ma mchis pa/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags ma thon
307b4(khri brgyad): zhe 'di skad du 'dri ste/ gas te chos thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin na/ ci s+tha/ 
307b5(khri brgyad): ma'i skyes du di nipa lamagyi sa sa phyin pa la baphra'as nas/ rnam pa tham sa mkhyen pa nyid ngas pa gdang sa gyur ma shes 'a drims/ des ngag zhes pana'i drang du ga pa pashA kyi/ de bzhi kyis kyi
307b6(khri brgyad): 'dibs mgatan kyi ma phyin pal bslabs/ bcod pa kyi tu phyin pas bslas/ brjod pa'i po rog sbyin pa la bslab / tshul thams kyi tu phyin pal bam sa/ sbyin pa'i ngo chen sa
307b7(khri brgyad): nas/ rnam pa thams 'dam khyen pa nyid sa par byung bar 'gyur pa/ de banin du kyi ska ma'i skyes bu na nye bar gnag pa rnamase la bslabs nas/ rnam mams da byen pa nyid rnaMs par 'byung bar gyur la/  / 
307b8(khri brgyad): N+Da9/  sgru skyes su seM largya ba ma yin pa da rgya sa ma 'asla napa/ rnam pa tha nam byen pa nyid du pa byung gyungs/ nan kyi rgyu mi skyes su di bzhin ga nags/ 
308a1(khri brgyad): stabs bcul bslabs na/ rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyid nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du sbyar ti ci ma'i skyes bu di sangs rgyas kyi chom ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslabs nas/ 
308a2(khri brgyad): / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ras zhes bgyi ba nas/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes su 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bslabs na nam bathams pada' byed pa nyid me bar byung bar 'gyur ram nas sa
308a3(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis lan ji skad gdab par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir khyod nyid
308a4(khri brgyad): dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan nig yin snya ma 'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
308a5(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa yang gdanas skam yang gzhan nig yin rnam la/ shwa rA tI du 'di sum du sems/ dran pa nye ba ga nag pa rnams kya gzhan ga sgyus yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ de bzhin du swA te/ 'amags
308a6(khri brgyad): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar yang gzhan la/ sbrum yang gzhan zhig len skam 'am/ shwa rarA ti'i bu 'di'i myu du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhanas/ snyam yang gnanan na yon snyam
308a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin du su he/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu brgyad kyi bar du yang gzhan la sbru ma yang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyi gnan sa sgyus yang gzhan/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan sa/ sku ma yang gzhan/ smon pa med pa yang
308a8(khri brgyad): gzhan pa/ spyam yang gzhan ni ga yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ smra ma yang gzhan nig yin snyam 'am/ gsol
308b1(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom gra pas lags so// de sta ga gas ca gzhas/ smram pa ga nam min te/ b+hU nyi na rnags yinapa/ gzugs kyid su bayin no// da ni ma ba dang / 'jugs dang / 'gyu rnamasas/ 
308b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyum yang gzhan ma yin te/ rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma yin pa/ skam nyid rnam par shes pa yin no// de bzhin du mig kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma yin te/ mig nyid bya ma yin la/ sgyum
308b3(khri brgyad): rgyu te/ mig ma na ra gnas/  ga gi sa nyin rkyen kyi na
308b4(khri brgyad): 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyi tsha rab nyid sgra ma yin no// yid kyi dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar yang gzhan la/ sgyum yang gzhan ma yin te/ sna nyid yid kyi 'du sa te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yin la/ yid kyi rgyas te reg pa'i
308b5(khri brgyad): rkyen gyi mtshor ba nyid sgyu ma yin no// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ snum yang gzhan ma yin te/ sgyum nyid ngan nye bar gnag pa rnams yin pa/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams nyid sgyu ma yin no// de bzhin
308b6(khri brgyad): du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du yang gzhan sa/ sbrum yang gzhan ma yin te/ zlu ma nyid 'a dgas pa'i lam yan lag brgyan pa yin pa/ 'phags pa'i sam yan lag brgyad pa nyid spya ma yin no// de bzhin
308b7(khri brgyad): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan sa/ spyam yang gzhan ma min/ sgyum nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs macu yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobasab cu nyid sgyu ma yin no// de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i
308b8(khri brgyad): rnams kyang gzhanas/ sgyum sang gzhan ma yin te/ sa nyi rnam pa sarab 'i ninam payin pa/ rnam papa' ji ston papa nyid rgyu bayin no// de bzhi du smra te/ bas rgyam chol ma dres pa co rgyad kyi das
309a1(khri brgyad): gdan la/ sbru ma yang gzhan ma yin te/ sgyu ma nyid sa sa rgyab kyi tsho 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yin pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brlob rgyad nyid sgyu ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka la pa/ hA
309a2(khri brgyad): 'i ji snyan du sems/ 'on sum de kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnab pa byang ba dmigs skam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa lags so// shA rA tI'-i'aM buMbu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'on sprul
309a3(khri brgyad): / skye'am/ 'gag pa yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// shA rA ti'i bu 'ding snyam du sems/ gang ba kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang
309a4(khri brgyad): 'gag pa mi snang ba de shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su 'thob par gyur snyam 'ag/ gsapa
309a5(khri brgyad): brda btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags po// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di'i myu du semapa/ 'di tu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang tha snyad 'di nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams la 'dog
309a6(khri brgyad): / gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags so// shA ra gyi'i bu dzi dzi lta du sems/ gang ming med pa dang / baja ma pa dang / btags pa med pa dang / ma sna med pa dang / meng du gdags pa med pa dag/

309b1(khri brgyad): rlab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da/  mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyim shes rab kyi sa tshol tu byid pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pathams cad mchen pa nyid dungs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// den rgyas bgangastsal pa dang / bam da/ 
309b2(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa di'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ro tu phyin pa 'di ltar spyod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du nges par 'gyu / 
309b3(khri brgyad): rtag tu sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bslabs par bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du de na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag / shasgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bur rig par bgyi ba'i slad ro// 
309b4(khri brgyad): shA ra rA ti'i bu 'a ji snyam du sems/ tshon nyeb len pa'i phung po la po 'di ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrubs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ btsun pa' // 
309b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ma lags sa// daci'i slad pa nan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga pa dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa ring ba nyid lags pa/ dngos pa ma mchis de mjan nyid dbang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i spang // 
309b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'odag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam ba/ 
309b7(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmil ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo ma nyid lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang dmigs su
309b8(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i sre du'o// bka' gyul pa/ shA ra dA ji sa mdum mas/ phung po po dag zag susade lapa 'am/ de bded dmig songs bungang / sreg sus bu dang / sprul bal bu len sta lam/ gsol pa
310a1(khri brgyad): bdu pa co ldanas sa gas sa/  phrum sa pa'i dang sadus ma/ su sa pa'i dag shes rab rgya rgyan pal bslabs na rnam thams cad mkhyer
310a2(khri brgyad): sa pa gzung cul// bdun pa ma ldams pa ga pa/  rdzun na/ 'dun pa po da sacan na shA dul nas shes/ de zhin
310a3(khri brgyad): 'du shes dang du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgram lta bu lags la/ rnam par shes pa gang lags padon dbang ma drug sa gas pa/ dbang po drug gang lags pa den nya pa len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams lags par

310a5(khri brgyad): dbang po drug lags la/ dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag lags te/ de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ma yang mi dmigs lags so// 
310a6(khri brgyad): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'on byang chub sems dpa' thag pa lagasar du zhugs pas zhes rab kyis rab tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di chos na smag cing dngangal/ dang bar mi 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / 
310a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis tsho bldan pa shAr 'i nul 'din ces bka' gyur to// shA ra ti'i bugs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dngas chen po thog pa lagasar du yang dag par zhugs pas/ shes rang kyim
310a8(khri brgyad): byed pa la thabs la mkhas pa yang ma yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lagatu yang ba lang ma yin na/ klag cing dang ma dang bar 'gyur ro// gsol ma/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang
310b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa/ gangal spyod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa ras tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di sa nas/ me skrag me dang shing dang bar mi 'gyur ba dra/ 
310b2(khri brgyad): la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol// phyin pa la spyod pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas
310b3(khri brgyad): kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba'i rnam pa sa mor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du rnam tha thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dpa zhu byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
310b4(khri brgyad): rtag ces bya ba'i rnam par mo sor rtog cing de yang mi dmigs te/ shwa ra rA tI'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra gyi rol tu phyin pa ma da pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// shwa ra rAdwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
310b5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed pa na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs de bzhen
310b6(khri brgyad): tshor ba dang / bdu shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par sa sa ton ste/ de yang mi dmigs de bzhin du sU he/ gtsugs bdag med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang me
310b7(khri brgyad): dmigs/ des ni du tshor ba dang / du shes dang / lu byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par so sor rtogs/ de yang mi dmigs/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par mo sor rtog ste/ de yang mi
310b8(khri brgyad): dmigs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi
311a1(khri brgyad): dmigs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshanam med pa'i rnam par ma sar rtog ste/ de yang mid chags/ dazugs sna pa/ 
311a2(khri brgyad): pa bapa tsun / des mi dzin / ga pa dang / 'a ma / rnamapa rna pa pa na thugs
311a3(khri brgyad): dben pa'i rnam par so so tog ste/ nges pa mi dmigs/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par mo sor rtog ste/ de yang ni dmig ga gzugs sa
311a4(khri brgyad): 'gyu ba rnam par mopo ga sa/ de yang ming minas/ de bzhin tshur ba dang / 'dugs dang 'a byang rnaMms dang / rnam pa shes pa rnam pa kyang ba'i rnam par tham drug ste/ de yang mi dmigagag
311a5(khri brgyad): sleb med pa'i rnab par mtho tog ste/ de sa mi dmigs/ de bzhin du ba dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byed rnam pa dang / rnam par shes pa rgya ba med pa'i rnam par so sor rtseg ste/ de yang mi dmigs
311a6(khri brgyad): gzugs dgag pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs/ de bzhin tshur ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa'i rnam par mosang rtog ste/ 
311a7(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs/ gzug sa dngas po med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste// de sa mi dmigs/ de zhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / nga byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa das po med pa'i rnam par ma sor rtog tu dang / 
311b1(khri brgyad): dmigs pa ste/ shA ra R+Ya ng+gA'i bu don byang chub sems dpa' sems dang mtshan shes rab kyang rab tu ldan pa la spyad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yinan// shA d+ya tI bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa na
311b2(khri brgyad): de ltar po sor rtog cing / gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang
311b3(khri brgyad): bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang de 'azhin tu rnam par shes pa'i bar du bdag med ces bya bar chos ston ring / dem
311b4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du stong zhes bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhin tu rnam par zhe
311b5(khri brgyad): pa'i bar du mtshan ma med ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du smon pa med ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi
311b6(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i rdul zhes ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du ni zhes bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul kye ba ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhi
311b7(khri brgyad): darnam par shes pa'i bar du dben zhes byab che ba ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med ces bya ba chos ston
311b8(khri brgyad): cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du/ 'gag par med ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang ming mag sa
312a1(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis stor padang gzugs dang / de bzhin du dmangar shes pa'i bar dung ngom po med ces bya bar chos ston cing/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i dul gyis ston pa den/ 
312a2(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
312a3(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya bar yid la mi byed de/ de
312a4(khri brgyad): yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// gzugs dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mid la mi byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyan thos dang / 
312a5(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid pa byed ba dag gis gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / steng zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / 
312a6(khri brgyad): dam par brang zhes bya ba dang / skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / dngos po med ces bya ba'i bar du yid la mi byed de/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du nyan thos dang / 
312a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / stongab zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / slong pa
312a8(khri brgyad): pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par bya ba zhes bya ba dang / skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / dngos po med ces bya bar yid la mi byed cing / de yang / 
312b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i rul gyis te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyipha rol du phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nga/ 
312b2(khri brgyad): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi ga/ 
312b3(khri brgyad): pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / dper ba'i rnam pa dang / 
312b4(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang / skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / dngos po med pa'i rnam par/ so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
312b5(khri brgyad): po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi 'khrug pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi dpal spyod pa ni/ rnam
312b6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la byed pa dag gis gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du sdug bsngal pa'i rnam pa dang / bdag ma
312b7(khri brgyad): / ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang / skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / 'gag pa
312b8(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i rnam pangs sor tog ste/ de li mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// de bzhin du tshang ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byad rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag pa rnam pa
313a1(khri brgyad): sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / spyong pa rnam pa dang mtshan ma med pa rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / ni ba'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam padang
313a2(khri brgyad): rnam par byang ba'i rnam pa dang / skye ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i rnam pa dngos po med pa'i rnam par so sor tog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tog pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
313a3(khri brgyad): ldan pa'i yod la byed pa'i brtson pa ming dor ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ma rol du phyin pa la snang pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya'o// shA
313a4(khri brgyad): dra ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spod pa gzugs la mi rtag pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so// deng

313b1(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pazi rinas byed badrag dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ma gang dag blan med pa yang ga pas gras 'i byang chub ba ma thong ba gshin pas mi
313b2(khri brgyad): bde ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa maskrod pa'i bsam gtan gyi sa brel du phyin pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
313b3(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba ni/ 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong ste/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// de ba

313b7(khri brgyad): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba

314a1(khri brgyad): rnams srung ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// slong nyin kyang dranapa nya bar gzhug pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid
314a2(khri brgyad): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sno
314a3(khri brgyad): bcu'i stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid kya nga stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/

314a7(khri brgyad): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang /

314b1(khri brgyad): dpon kyi gnas ngan pan dang bral ba yang ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa pa'abar ba dang ldan pa yangs yin/ 'din shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na ga cang dang pa/ dang bar zur ro// daci'i gyon/ 'a

315a1(khri brgyad): / sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mashesapar kyi ro du kyim mngon pa 'asrabs par tu mgaser ma so chag sadapa zhe rdza dang / gti mug su ba pa 'dod pa dang / 'jig tshogs la sta ba spang /

315b1(khri brgyad): rangang song gsum po dag/ 'i lung bdang / rigs dma' bdag tu yang 'i skye ba dang / nyan thos dang / rangs sas rgyas kyis yang srung bar mi 'gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pas shes rab kyi

315b6(khri brgyad): bar chos ston cing / de yang mi rig pa pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi tag ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i rdul
315b7(khri brgyad): kyis ston la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ma gtogs par na ne nam dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su mi bsde ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan
315b8(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen med do// thar te'abu gzhen pang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bzhes dashen ni gang gzugs sdus/  bsngal zhes bya bar chol rgo byeng // de yang mi dmig sa pa'i chul kyis da/ 
316a1(khri brgyad): bdang / de bzhin tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa lngag bsngal zhes byab chol ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la// dgapa'i rtsa bded gca nas

316a3(khri brgyad): mamachis pa mi das ni ma mami dang pa ma ma sa la rnams ca phrul ma stan pa sa / sa thab ste

316a7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i 'u gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyer
316a8(khri brgyad): ni gang mig mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi ma sbyor pa dang / de bzhin du yid kyibar du mi rtag ces bya bar ches stor cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdor la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
316b1(khri brgyad): ram pa 'ams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sang yongs su mi bsngob ste// de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ma chen po dan pa'i bshes gnyen yin no// shwa ra ra ti'i bu gzhan 'ang bya
316b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang mig sdug pa la zhes bya ba dang / ba rang AHsa na nga das ye ma tsun pa med ces dang / shi shes bya ba dang / dpan zhes byab dang nam/ 
316b3(khri brgyad): par byang shes bya ba dang / skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang // dngos po med ces bya bar chol ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa dang / yid kyi bar du yang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces
316b4(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang /  skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / dngos po
316b5(khri brgyad): med ces bya bar chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston la// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thol dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ de/ 
316b6(khri brgyad): ri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang yig zhi 'bus te reg pa'i rkyed
316b7(khri brgyad): ma tshor ba min la ces bya bar chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du yi kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du me rtag ces bya bar chos stor cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lho la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams
316b8(khri brgyad): cad pa khyen pa nyid ma gtags par nyar thom dang / rang sangs rgyas kyim yongs su mi bsngob ste/ shA nga te bude byed chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyer yin no// de bzhin du mug bsngal nas
317a1(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben nas bya ba dang / rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang / skye ba da
317a2(khri brgyad): ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / dngos po med ces bya bar chos skyon cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skyon la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
317a3(khri brgyad): rang sangs rgyas kyi mar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no// thA tI'i bu gan na yang byang chub sems dpa'
317a4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i dpe ba'i bshes gzhan ni/ gang dran pa bar gnag pa bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston par byed pa nas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa nyin gyi phyir chos ston cing / dayang mi dmigs
317a5(khri brgyad): la khyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong sa bsgom pa'i phyir dang / rdzu baphrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa'i phyi dug/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam pasgom pa'i phying chos
317a6(khri brgyad): / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du stong pa nyid nga mtshar mi med pa dang / smyon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin
317a7(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ba sgom pa'i phyir/ chos ston pa nas/ de bzhin du s+ya / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag bsgom pa'i phyir chos ston cing / de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
317a8(khri brgyad): ston la/ dag pa'i rtsa la de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
317b1(khri brgyad): ba bsgom pa'i phyi chos ston cing / dayeng mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snyom pa/ dag pa rtsa ba kya rnam pa thams cad sa myed pa da ma gtogs pa sa kyis 'am rangs ngas rgyas kyipa yongs
317b2(khri brgyad): s+ye/ shA ra ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag pa'i bshes gnyen yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shAr r+ya'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdun pa bcom ldanas
317b3(khri brgyad): skyo na bya chub sems dpa' mams dpa' chen po gang shes ra gyi ros phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas skag cig das la nga bar 'gyung / shes rab kyis rol du phyin pa thabs pa mi mkhas pa gas shing
317b4(khri brgyad): dge pa thogs pa sa pa mchis la lags/ spyod sa sol pa dang / bcom rnam sa man lda su pa ma pa kAg+sa // b+ha gA'i bu la byang chubasasas da
317b5(khri brgyad): semasadapa chen ma mams cad sakhyen nyid dzin pa sa kyad bdag thamabs sal ma kyis pakris ning/ shas kyi ma du phyin dus migs/ 
317b6(khri brgyad): byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa
317b7(khri brgyad): sdom dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i bar de dag kyang dmigs la sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i bar des kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
318a1(khri brgyad): la thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhing / sdig pa'i phyogs po'i lag dang song ba yin po rma shA ran ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed
318a2(khri brgyad): bdag dang bral bas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis na gzugs stongags bya bar yid la byed pa nas/ nang gigazugs dngos pa med mamang zand stong pa nyid kyi bar yin zhes yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin du migs pa'i tshul
318a3(khri brgyad): kyim tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'a byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong zhes bya ba ma yid la byed pa dang / nang gig zugs de mang rang srong nyi nas// dngos po med tshamadzin nyi stong pa nyid kyi bang du dmigs par bya / 
318a4(khri brgyad): pa 5/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnapas dang / rnam par shes nas dang stong pa 'di dag/  ma tham mimang ca nyin sto kyi yang du migs par byed cing / de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed
318a5(khri brgyad): bzhin du mig dang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing khaskong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/ de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin
318a6(khri brgyad): du pa dang / sA dang lnga dang / lus dang / yid dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed la/ stong ba de dag gis kyang chom sa
318a7(khri brgyad): byed pa ste/ shIng dre ti'i bu ltar dbyang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la thabs ma mi mkhas pa yin ning / 'asdig pa'i gyonas po'i lag sa song ba yin no// shAr
318a8(khri brgyad): 'babs lam mkhas pas shes rab kyi rol du phyin ma la spyod pam/ char banye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgos zhing 'dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ de dag gis cha rlom sems su byed pa dang / 
318b1(khri brgyad): bzhid dugu te/ yang rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dres pa bco lda gyi bar dag bsgom zhing / de dag dmim pa la/ 'dag gis cang tshum sem la du byed pa ste/ shAm gyi'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de lta ba shes rabagyi
318b2(khri brgyad): laspyod pa ni/ thabs mi mkhas pasam pas la mi mkhas pa yin zhing / sdig pa'i phyogs kyi'i bag tu song sa shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa bstan pa thos nas yang phrag cing/ rangab la nga par 'gyur ro// / lags
318b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rong du phyin pa chib/ bam po bdun pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di grad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs par tsha
318b4(khri brgyad): su zin pa lags shing / sdig pa'i grogs po gang gis yongs su bzung bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ skrag cing dngas la dang par 'gyus lags/ re skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rtse
318b5(khri brgyad): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsas to// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i thogs po ni shes rab kyipha rol du phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ 'dun pa zlog par byed cing / 
318b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / rtson 'grus kyi yo du phyin pa dang /  song ba'i pha rolangadu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar byed/ bdun pa rdzom
318b7(khri brgyad): bar byed de/ bye rigs kyi bu 'di ba bslab par mi bya'o// de ci phyi ser/ khyel rol du phyin pa 'di dag ni bzhin gshegs pa dkya bcom pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing bas dpa ma yin
318b8(khri brgyad): 'di dag ni sman dngags mkhar gyis rang bcor byas pa yin te/ kye bding na rim tan par mi bya/ gzung bar mi bya laldan chub par 'ibya klag par mi bya/ yid la mi byad/ gzhan dag la ya bas
319a1(khri brgyad): la bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas/ kyebye rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'dis khyod la ci rig bya/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas ci zhigaH/ 
319a2(khri brgyad): yod pa'i rol du phyin pas kyi'i bya/ chul rnams kyi ma rol du phyin pa pa ci nig kyi/ sbyin pa'i rol du zin pas ci zhig bya zhes pa rol du phyin ba drug dang 'bral bar byed pa'i 'dud kyilas dag mi ston cing / bdud kyi nyis pa

319a5(khri brgyad): byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsapa par byed/ yang dag par rab tu stor bar byed pa'i 'dud kyil ba kya na/  mdzod kyi rtsor cing/ yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rje

320a2(khri brgyad): cing / yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
320a3(khri brgyad): dag phrog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag ston te/ de dag rjes su ston par byed pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi rjod mi ston cing / yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pag
320a4(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sdig pa'i thogs par rige par bya'o// thA dwa ti'i bugazha yang bdud sdig can mkhar po dang / slob dpon kyi byang du bsgyur ci ba 'ongs nas

320b1(khri brgyad): kyis la pe lta bu re / sa rjod mi ston cing / yang dgu par rtogs par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dbung sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i thogs pa rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i zug zhanam 'a
320b2(khri brgyad): can mi sdang ba'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs na 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ gang gi don du bskal tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa bca
320b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / rkang pa bcad pa dang / mgo bcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'byung zhing / blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci sreg bya/ gang rgyur du ma
320b4(khri brgyad): 'i 'bras bu bangon sum du bya bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon bum du bya bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod pa ston ce/ 
320b5(khri brgyad): nga dag par rtogs par mi byed pa de'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bskur cing / byang chub sems dpa' ma
320b6(khri brgyad): chen po'i dru po sa das/ de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyi mchis ston/ de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / stob zhes bya ba dang / mtshon ma med ces bya ba dang so
320b7(khri brgyad): de ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang / skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces bya ba dang / dngos po med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/ de ba
320b8(khri brgyad): mig paslang ba de bzhin du mi da'i bal la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/ de bani rgyan pa nyes gdag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i rdul gyi mchob ston cing / de bzhin du sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dag bdan pa
321a1(khri brgyad): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par byang zhes bya ba dang / skye ba med ces bya ba dang / 'gag pa med ces
321a2(khri brgyad): bdang / dngos po med ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyi mchos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / de bzhin de ba'i

321a5(khri brgyad): las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi ston cing / yang dag par rtogs par mi byed pa 'don/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig da nga yongs su spong bar po'o// de skad
321a6(khri brgyad): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la cha dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la ma khas pa gang dang ldan/ 
321a7(khri brgyad): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags shing sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phrul ba/ 
321a8(khri brgyad): ltab spong ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba spang ba'i phyir dang / skyeb po bas pa dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gsobar lta ba dang / gang bgadug pa dang / shed pas skyes dang / 
321b1(khri brgyad): she su dang / byang du 'jug pa po dang / byed pazod pa/ spong babo dang / kun napa spong bapodang / tsho ba pa dang / tshor bar byed pa do dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por bya ba spang ba'i phyir sems ca rnams 'tshas ston
321b2(khri brgyad): bzhin du chad pa dang / rtag par lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / bden par
321b3(khri brgyad): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams su la ba nas/ de bezhin du sbyarate/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar
321b4(khri brgyad): baspang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chas ston pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
321b5(khri brgyad): bar du lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bdin du sems can yongs su smin par bya bar la ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs sudas par bya bar lnga ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor
321b6(khri brgyad): bskor bar lta ba spang ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa ste/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par snga
321b7(khri brgyad): yin no// shA dwa ti'i bu bu zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bdag sa/ bskyong pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi 'khor mo bskor ba'i bang du rtsub sa
321b8(khri brgyad): sems can rnams pa chos ston pa de thams cad med migs par rdul kyis chos ston na/ shwar dra tir bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bas la ma khas pas yong pa bu yin pa dang / sdig pa'i tshogs so
322a1(khri brgyad): pangs pa'i bar yin so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshad pa rdza pa b+hA ba ci'i bla 'di skad ceg gas so// @
322a2(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i slang du sems can rnams la chos ston lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ro ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' mams dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur lags/ de bzhin du tshor bar rtsa
322a3(khri brgyad): dang rdza 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba lags/ de bzhin du mig tu lta ba lags shing // de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du lta ba lags/ de bzhin du gzugs su lta ba lags cig/ 
322a4(khri brgyad): bzhin du sbyang te/ chos kyi par dug pa bags/ de bzhin du mig gi khams sulta bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yi bi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du lta ba lags/ de bzhin du gzugs kyi thams sa sa
322a5(khri brgyad): shAr ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar du lta ba lags/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lta ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du la ba lags/ de bzhin du
322a6(khri brgyad): zhizhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta ba lags shing / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du lta ba 'gas/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shwa
322a7(khri brgyad): radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dbang sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
322a8(khri brgyad): tshul gyis gzugs yul ba bskyed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes par lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du mig
322b1(khri brgyad): du megs shi dpags pa'i tshul gyis mig sgrub bsnad du/  nang dug/  ga dam na du naso/ da nga gzugs gas shi migs pal
322b2(khri brgyad): gyis gzugs rnams su lta pa bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams su la ba bskyed do// de bzhin du mig ni khams dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig
322b3(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i tshub kyis gzugs kyi khams su lta ba bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ chol gyi khams kyi bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshu kyi ma chos kyi khams sul ba bskyed do// de bzhin du can banye bar gzhag pa ma
322b4(khri brgyad): dmigs shing dbyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gags par thab bskyed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i las las paka brkyang pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i rdul gyim 'phags pa'i lam lan lag pa
322b5(khri brgyad): bdU pa skye'o//  bzer drung bzhir gshegs pa'i sabs brgyad mi byis shing migs pa'i tshu kyis de ga la kal bskyed po// de bden dubyur te/ sangs rgyam gyi chom ma 'chas pa bco brgyad gyi bar du dmigs shing
322b6(khri brgyad): ti'i bu rgyu des na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes
322b7(khri brgyad): ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mig
323a1(khri brgyad): rin du sbyar te/ chos kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mig gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbar te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
323a2(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams sul por 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar du lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du na pa nye por gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te 'phags pa'i lam ya
323a3(khri brgyad): brkyang ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du lnga bar 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sem
323a4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs pa mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston to// de ras ba
323a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa bA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dor gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes makyi bal bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom
323a6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shwar dwa ti'i bu khyod spobs sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slobs lags so// 'o ngi lta bu'in/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sem
323a7(khri brgyad): / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thur mong ma lags pa ste/ dor nges na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
323a8(khri brgyad): 'das pa di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems cag pa ma mchis pa khams gsum du ma gtogs pa de ni/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bag
323b1(khri brgyad): bgang lags pa de la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i blang du bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pakyi'o// de da ces gsol bdag bcom ldan pa gnyis me ldan shA zhi'i tshul 'di sad ces bkar/ 
323b2(khri brgyad): stsal to// shA ti'i bu byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po'i mi mnyam pa dang nyam pa'i sems can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas bams cad da thun mo ma yin pa'i sems dag yin/ de skad ces paka'aphrul par/ 
323b3(khri brgyad): radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag par
323b4(khri brgyad): yang gapa rjes du mi mthong ste/ ches ga ya khrig pa ma 'phel ya mi tsun / yang man mongs pa lag nas sa sa papa mchis lags so//  ldan
323b5(khri brgyad): dbyi ba las cig/ 'phel ba sa mchig kud das nyon mongs pa ma mchig rnam par byang bam mchis nyan kyis kyi sems dang / rang sa sa rgyas kyi sems dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya rgya semasam mchis pa bya ma/ 
323b6(khri brgyad): dba' sems dpa' chen po'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems can thos dang nga sangs rgyas thams cad dang phu mong sa lags pa'i sems lags so// de byang ches gsol pa dag bcom tham ras kyis tshe bldan pa bAr ti'i bus/ 
323b7(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shwa ra dwa ti'i bus gang smras pa de bzhin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis de la yang sems
323b8(khri brgyad): sam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed napas dang / rnam par shes pa la yang sems de chags pa
324a1(khri brgyad): bas yang sems rgyags pa ma mchib lanas sam/ de bzhi dug rgyas rnams pa yang sams demabyas pas mchis lagasasam/ spad dang ngo cig bya dang / chos rnams la yang sems chags
324a2(khri brgyad): ma mchis lagasas / de bzhin du mig gi khams la lang sems chags pa ma mchis lagams ma/ de bzhin du myur te li kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyil bab yang sems ni chags pa ma mchi gas sa ma/ deb
324a3(khri brgyad): gzugs kyi khams la yang sems chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar la yang sems chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du ngam nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang sems de

324a5(khri brgyad): mchis lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yang sems de chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ ga zugs la yang sems chags
324a6(khri brgyad): pa med do// de bzhin tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pal yang sems de chags pa med do// de bzhin du mig la sems chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar la sems degs
324a7(khri brgyad): ba med do// de bzhin du gzugs khams la sems chags pa med pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos rnams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med do// de bzhin du mi gi khams la sems de chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
324a8(khri brgyad): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi par la sems de chags pa med do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams la sems chags pa med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos kyi khams kyi bar la sems de chags pa med /  \u0f7f
324b1(khri brgyad): kun shi ba gnag pa rnams la sems dachags pa med pa na pa/ de bzhin du lags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la sems chags pa med pa yang de bzhin du sbya sa/ rab zhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
324b2(khri brgyad): sethas de chags pa med panas/ de bzhin du sa / yangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bco rgyad kyi ba la sems tshams pa med pa yir no// de nas com ldan 'das la che ldan pa shA ci'i bus di da ces ga mamato// rgyu
324b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ce rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ga yin pa bang bas pa med cing khams gsung mams cad du toms pa ma ri zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcan pabacom ldan 'das byis pa
324b4(khri brgyad): sems ca kyi ses kyang sa bzhi gyis stong ga kyis du cag pa ma mchis shi ba mas gsu dus gtogs pa rnams pa/ de dzin ldan thoms sa rgya khams cad das bcom ldan 'das de pazhinan
324b5(khri brgyad): brnams kyi lpags de yang bag pas mchis shing khams gsum dum gcogs pa lags sa ma/ khala' stsal sa shA dwa ti'i bu de de bzhimamo/ gsal la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ga shi rtsis stong pa nyid kyi
324b6(khri brgyad): bamamachis shing khams gsum dum gtogs pa lags sam/ de bzhin tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam sa dpa rnam pa shes pa yang bzhin gyis stong nyid ci snang da ga pa ma mchis zhing 'ams gsum dum

324b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ yid kyi bar du yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du bag pa ma mchis shing kham pa gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ shA la dwa ti'i bu re de bzhin ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan pa

325b1(khri brgyad): na mas byu dun rung nas kla rdzas pam mtshab shi khams gsus bus gtogs pa lags sam/ dpe bar du gyur te/ sa margyas kyis ches sa 'arnam pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yang rang bzhin
325b2(khri brgyad): ngang nyid kyi slang du zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum du ma gtogs pa lags sar/ bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu dede bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byim pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzha

326b1(khri brgyad): bas/ bcud pa bcom ldan 'das da bzhi ga shegs pa'i stobs brgya ma mchis pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa na stobs brtsam mchis pal chags pa ma mchis lags sam/ de bzhin du slar / yangs rgyas kyi chosas 'dres pa//

327a1(khri brgyad): kha cing bas pas nyanas kyis 'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyis ba lta ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ma mchis pa lam 'jug pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon na gang la dag sbyi ma
